name: Tristan Parker
text: I reached out to Two Men and a Truck for a quote on a commercial move. I received a phone call with in a few minutes asking me the details of the move and scheduled a time for a rep to come do a walk through and give a quote.  The quote was very reasonable considering the what we were needing moved. We decided to go with a week day to move as it is cheaper than Fridays or Saturdays. The guys showed up on time and work ready! I can not say one thing bad about our move yesterday other than it was so incredibly hot and I felt so bad for them. Fabulous job! Fabulous crew! Fabulous experience! Keep up the good work guys!

resp.text: Hi Tristan, Thank you for choosing the Movers Who Care and sharing how your recent move went. We truly appreciate it and are so happy to have helped make the day easier!

name: Nick Phillis
text:
ISSUE: Two Men and a Truck charged my card additional amount different from the final invoice WITHOUT permission. Management team did not always conduct professional business. See below:

We used Two Men and a Truck back in February. The crew did a decent job overall. They were hard working, the driver, Nate was exceptional. He had a great work ethic and was super professional and led the group.

My issue is with the management team. There was a discrepancy with the amount of time spent and the amount charged. The driver took off a little time from our final invoice because they spent an hour getting the electric bed upstairs. Essentially what he did was take off the $125 deposit from the quote. I felt like that was fair and I signed the final invoice. At that point I was happy with the move and we went on our merry way.

A few days later, I get an additional $125 charge from them on my credit card. Later that day, the operations manager who I believe his name is Joey, calls me to explain that he charged my card an additional $125 because I was quoted wrong on the final invoice. I explained to him that Nate took the $125 deposit off of the invoice because of the extra time it took them to move things when it shouldn’t have taken that much time. He explained to me that Nate didn’t have that authority and that I will have to pay the $125. I told Joey that I signed the final invoice giving them permission to charge my card for that final amount, in which he has no right to charge my card AGAIN without my permission. He then explained that he felt they have the right. If you give me a final invoice with an amount and I sign it, that is an agreement between the business and the client. A business has no right to change an agreement or amount after it has been signed by both parties. I got a call the next day from another manager to see how the move went. She was very nice and I explained the situation. I explained how I felt I was wronged in that my card was charged again without my permission, how Joey was unprofessional and does not conduct good business. She said that this information would be taken up the chain and people would be made aware. Ultimately nothing was done about it in the end. I just feel like it’s stealing when someone charges your card for an additional amount without permission. Just be aware.

resp.text: Hello Mr. Phillis, We're very sorry to learn of your recent move experience. With a 96% referral rate, we can assure you this is not the norm. We would be happy to speak with you further and encourage you to reach our team at 251-316-5977 so we may help.

name: Thatchic
text: Office staff seemed nice. Apparently they did not ask an important question. I was asked how many bedrooms and the number of items in each. I was also asked about living and dining room furniture. The guys showed up. One experienced, and one not. They started at one on, and by 3:30 they had only cleared one bedroom. My bedroom furniture is very heavy, and the guys were having a hard time. They informed management who brushed them off. I called with a concern about the time. I was told that my oak furniture was the problem. I was asked about quality of furniture on my initial call. This company moved this same furniture for me on a previous occasion. Anyway because of the time they had to leave some stuff behind and go to the drop off location. The supervisor eventually agreed to send help. Long after the mover told them of the problem. Initially I was told that I would have to cover this cost. Once the third guy arrived things went quick. He was experienced. My dresser was not able to be attached to my mirror because they left the screws for that at the location that I was leaving. So I have to find someone to do that. I live alone and don’t have a clue on how to do that. I did find the screws at the old address. I also found a complete mess left behind by the workers. At the new location, my living room and dining room furniture was just placed wherever. Three of my nightstands were left wrapped in plastic. I have plenty of pictures if needed. I do not fault the workers. When the worker informed the supervisor of the heavy oak bedroom furniture, assistance should have been immediately provided. Not later. They guys had to leave everything as such because of the time. I could not afford to pay $125 per hour for two additional hours. This is what was needed because of the wasted hours on the “heavy” furniture. Apparently they knew nothing about doing my move. It was a last minute surprise for them. They had just finished a job and was told that this job was only 12 items. Sounds like they were duped into it. Poor preparation on the supervisor’s behalf. Again I do not fault the movers. They asked for help at the onset and were ignored. They were extremely apologetic for the inconvenience. This is by far the worst experience I have ever had with a moving company. I will not recommend this company at all. I will also be contacting the corporate office. I feel like I was robbed. The workers deserved to be paid, because they did their best. They were exhausted. I feel like my cost should have been heavily discounted because the job is inadequate and incomplete. I have to pay out more money to get someone to help sort through the mess left behind. This move cost me $750!!!

name: Gypsy Spirit Underground
text: I hired them to move a business from a storage facility to a store front.  They completely underestimated the size of the truck needed and it ended up costing me more money cause they had to make 2 trips.  They measured and still sent the wrong size truck. After bringing  this to their attention they were to have a meeting and get back with me...NO RESPONSE, NO REFUND bad business.  Buyer beware..call someone else.

resp.text: Mrs. Ratajczack, first and foremost, I apologize that we didn't not live up to the standard of service you expected from us. I went back and reviewed your paperwork and contact logs and I wanted to hopefully clear up some items for you. All of our trucks are 26 feet in length. While we do have two "shorter" trucks in our fleet, it has to do with the height, not the floor space. We did go over on your original estimate by 30 minutes. While we always hope to hit the number spot on, we do sometimes miss and we thoroughly cover and explain to all customers how we bill on actual time used, not the estimate. This was covered in the pre-move email you received on 4/3/2018 and is also covered in item 1 on the Move Service contract that you and all of our customers sign before we begin a move.  Your move notes do say that our men "did a great job" but you were frustrated by the second trip that was made. I did not see however in those notes where a meeting was supposed to take place. If this somehow fell through the cracks, I sincerely apologize and will be happy to speak with you personally about the matter. You can reach me at the office @ 251-316-5977 or by email billy.stovall@twomen.com   While we never like to receive poor reviews, we will learn from it and hopefully improve our service to all customers. I appreciate you taking the time to leave it. Billy Stovall - Owner Two Men And A Truck Mobile, AL

name: Sarah McLeod
text:
3 years ago I used Two Men and a Truck and was very satisfied. Two men moved us from a house to an apartment across town, with a pit stop at a storage unit in between, in 2.5 hours. The guys were amazing. When I needed to move a couple weeks ago, due to my great experience previously, I chose to use this company again.

I don't know what has happened in the last 3 years, but I will never use this company again. They sent 3 guys this time, which would make you think it would take less time, right? No. I moved to an apartment that was 2 lights down from my then current apartment, and we again visited the storage unit, which is down the street from the new apartment. We basically went in a quarter mile triangle.  It took these 3 guys over 6 hours to move the contents of a one bedroom apartment and a small storage unit. They knocked off like 45 minutes for the break they took in the middle, so I paid for 5.5 hours total.

You may be thinking, how much stuff did she buy in that 3 year period?? The only difference between the first time and second time were 2 bookshelves, a chair, and a washer/dryer. With an extra person, they basically took 3 hours to move 2 bookshelves, a chair, and a washer/dryer.

I wanted to give these guys the benefit of the doubt, but after watching them visibly hem and haw at moving my stuff, visibly waste my time and money, I just can't. They mentioned that this company is under new ownership, which may be part of the problem. Maybe these guys get commission, I don't know. All I know is that I paid $925 to move a 1 bedroom apartment and a 5x8 storage unit a quarter mile down the road.

Do not use this company.

resp.text: Hello Sarah, we are so sorry your experience wasn't what you had expected and didn't live up to the high standards we have at Two Men And A Truck. We always try to exceed our customers expectations. I appreciate your review as we always try to use them to make our service better for everyone. Thank you for taking the time to do so. Best wishes in the future.

name: Nick Phillis
text:
ISSUE: Two Men and a Truck charged my card additional amount different from the final invoice WITHOUT permission. Management team did not always conduct professional business. See below:

We used Two Men and a Truck back in February. The crew did a decent job overall. They were hard working, the driver, Nate was exceptional. He had a great work ethic and was super professional and led the group.

My issue is with the management team. There was a discrepancy with the amount of time spent and the amount charged. The driver took off a little time from our final invoice because they spent an hour getting the electric bed upstairs. Essentially what he did was take off the $125 deposit from the quote. I felt like that was fair and I signed the final invoice. At that point I was happy with the move and we went on our merry way.

A few days later, I get an additional $125 charge from them on my credit card. Later that day, the operations manager who I believe his name is Joey, calls me to explain that he charged my card an additional $125 because I was quoted wrong on the final invoice. I explained to him that Nate took the $125 deposit off of the invoice because of the extra time it took them to move things when it shouldn’t have taken that much time. He explained to me that Nate didn’t have that authority and that I will have to pay the $125. I told Joey that I signed the final invoice giving them permission to charge my card for that final amount, in which he has no right to charge my card AGAIN without my permission. He then explained that he felt they have the right. If you give me a final invoice with an amount and I sign it, that is an agreement between the business and the client. A business has no right to change an agreement or amount after it has been signed by both parties. I got a call the next day from another manager to see how the move went. She was very nice and I explained the situation. I explained how I felt I was wronged in that my card was charged again without my permission, how Joey was unprofessional and does not conduct good business. She said that this information would be taken up the chain and people would be made aware. Ultimately nothing was done about it in the end. I just feel like it’s stealing when someone charges your card for an additional amount without permission. Just be aware.

resp.text: Hello Mr. Phillis, We're very sorry to learn of your recent move experience. With a 96% referral rate, we can assure you this is not the norm. We would be happy to speak with you further and encourage you to reach our team at 251-316-5977 so we may help.

name: Thatchic
text: Office staff seemed nice. Apparently they did not ask an important question. I was asked how many bedrooms and the number of items in each. I was also asked about living and dining room furniture. The guys showed up. One experienced, and one not. They started at one on, and by 3:30 they had only cleared one bedroom. My bedroom furniture is very heavy, and the guys were having a hard time. They informed management who brushed them off. I called with a concern about the time. I was told that my oak furniture was the problem. I was asked about quality of furniture on my initial call. This company moved this same furniture for me on a previous occasion. Anyway because of the time they had to leave some stuff behind and go to the drop off location. The supervisor eventually agreed to send help. Long after the mover told them of the problem. Initially I was told that I would have to cover this cost. Once the third guy arrived things went quick. He was experienced. My dresser was not able to be attached to my mirror because they left the screws for that at the location that I was leaving. So I have to find someone to do that. I live alone and don’t have a clue on how to do that. I did find the screws at the old address. I also found a complete mess left behind by the workers. At the new location, my living room and dining room furniture was just placed wherever. Three of my nightstands were left wrapped in plastic. I have plenty of pictures if needed. I do not fault the workers. When the worker informed the supervisor of the heavy oak bedroom furniture, assistance should have been immediately provided. Not later. They guys had to leave everything as such because of the time. I could not afford to pay $125 per hour for two additional hours. This is what was needed because of the wasted hours on the “heavy” furniture. Apparently they knew nothing about doing my move. It was a last minute surprise for them. They had just finished a job and was told that this job was only 12 items. Sounds like they were duped into it. Poor preparation on the supervisor’s behalf. Again I do not fault the movers. They asked for help at the onset and were ignored. They were extremely apologetic for the inconvenience. This is by far the worst experience I have ever had with a moving company. I will not recommend this company at all. I will also be contacting the corporate office. I feel like I was robbed. The workers deserved to be paid, because they did their best. They were exhausted. I feel like my cost should have been heavily discounted because the job is inadequate and incomplete. I have to pay out more money to get someone to help sort through the mess left behind. This move cost me $750!!!

text: I hired them to move a business from a storage facility to a store front.  They completely underestimated the size of the truck needed and it ended up costing me more money cause they had to make 2 trips.  They measured and still sent the wrong size truck. After bringing  this to their attention they were to have a meeting and get back with me...NO RESPONSE, NO REFUND bad business.  Buyer beware..call someone else.

resp.text: Mrs. Ratajczack, first and foremost, I apologize that we didn't not live up to the standard of service you expected from us. I went back and reviewed your paperwork and contact logs and I wanted to hopefully clear up some items for you. All of our trucks are 26 feet in length. While we do have two "shorter" trucks in our fleet, it has to do with the height, not the floor space. We did go over on your original estimate by 30 minutes. While we always hope to hit the number spot on, we do sometimes miss and we thoroughly cover and explain to all customers how we bill on actual time used, not the estimate. This was covered in the pre-move email you received on 4/3/2018 and is also covered in item 1 on the Move Service contract that you and all of our customers sign before we begin a move.  Your move notes do say that our men "did a great job" but you were frustrated by the second trip that was made. I did not see however in those notes where a meeting was supposed to take place. If this somehow fell through the cracks, I sincerely apologize and will be happy to speak with you personally about the matter. You can reach me at the office @ 251-316-5977 or by email billy.stovall@twomen.com   While we never like to receive poor reviews, we will learn from it and hopefully improve our service to all customers. I appreciate you taking the time to leave it. Billy Stovall - Owner Two Men And A Truck Mobile, AL

name: Sarah McLeod
text:
3 years ago I used Two Men and a Truck and was very satisfied. Two men moved us from a house to an apartment across town, with a pit stop at a storage unit in between, in 2.5 hours. The guys were amazing. When I needed to move a couple weeks ago, due to my great experience previously, I chose to use this company again.

I don't know what has happened in the last 3 years, but I will never use this company again. They sent 3 guys this time, which would make you think it would take less time, right? No. I moved to an apartment that was 2 lights down from my then current apartment, and we again visited the storage unit, which is down the street from the new apartment. We basically went in a quarter mile triangle.  It took these 3 guys over 6 hours to move the contents of a one bedroom apartment and a small storage unit. They knocked off like 45 minutes for the break they took in the middle, so I paid for 5.5 hours total.

You may be thinking, how much stuff did she buy in that 3 year period?? The only difference between the first time and second time were 2 bookshelves, a chair, and a washer/dryer. With an extra person, they basically took 3 hours to move 2 bookshelves, a chair, and a washer/dryer.

I wanted to give these guys the benefit of the doubt, but after watching them visibly hem and haw at moving my stuff, visibly waste my time and money, I just can't. They mentioned that this company is under new ownership, which may be part of the problem. Maybe these guys get commission, I don't know. All I know is that I paid $925 to move a 1 bedroom apartment and a 5x8 storage unit a quarter mile down the road.

Do not use this company.

resp.text: Hello Sarah, we are so sorry your experience wasn't what you had expected and didn't live up to the high standards we have at Two Men And A Truck. We always try to exceed our customers expectations. I appreciate your review as we always try to use them to make our service better for everyone. Thank you for taking the time to do so. Best wishes in the future.

name: Nick Phillis
text:
ISSUE: Two Men and a Truck charged my card additional amount different from the final invoice WITHOUT permission. Management team did not always conduct professional business. See below:

We used Two Men and a Truck back in February. The crew did a decent job overall. They were hard working, the driver, Nate was exceptional. He had a great work ethic and was super professional and led the group.

My issue is with the management team. There was a discrepancy with the amount of time spent and the amount charged. The driver took off a little time from our final invoice because they spent an hour getting the electric bed upstairs. Essentially what he did was take off the $125 deposit from the quote. I felt like that was fair and I signed the final invoice. At that point I was happy with the move and we went on our merry way.

A few days later, I get an additional $125 charge from them on my credit card. Later that day, the operations manager who I believe his name is Joey, calls me to explain that he charged my card an additional $125 because I was quoted wrong on the final invoice. I explained to him that Nate took the $125 deposit off of the invoice because of the extra time it took them to move things when it shouldn’t have taken that much time. He explained to me that Nate didn’t have that authority and that I will have to pay the $125. I told Joey that I signed the final invoice giving them permission to charge my card for that final amount, in which he has no right to charge my card AGAIN without my permission. He then explained that he felt they have the right. If you give me a final invoice with an amount and I sign it, that is an agreement between the business and the client. A business has no right to change an agreement or amount after it has been signed by both parties. I got a call the next day from another manager to see how the move went. She was very nice and I explained the situation. I explained how I felt I was wronged in that my card was charged again without my permission, how Joey was unprofessional and does not conduct good business. She said that this information would be taken up the chain and people would be made aware. Ultimately nothing was done about it in the end. I just feel like it’s stealing when someone charges your card for an additional amount without permission. Just be aware.

resp.text: Hello Mr. Phillis, We're very sorry to learn of your recent move experience. With a 96% referral rate, we can assure you this is not the norm. We would be happy to speak with you further and encourage you to reach our team at 251-316-5977 so we may help.

name: Thatchic
text: Office staff seemed nice. Apparently they did not ask an important question. I was asked how many bedrooms and the number of items in each. I was also asked about living and dining room furniture. The guys showed up. One experienced, and one not. They started at one on, and by 3:30 they had only cleared one bedroom. My bedroom furniture is very heavy, and the guys were having a hard time. They informed management who brushed them off. I called with a concern about the time. I was told that my oak furniture was the problem. I was asked about quality of furniture on my initial call. This company moved this same furniture for me on a previous occasion. Anyway because of the time they had to leave some stuff behind and go to the drop off location. The supervisor eventually agreed to send help. Long after the mover told them of the problem. Initially I was told that I would have to cover this cost. Once the third guy arrived things went quick. He was experienced. My dresser was not able to be attached to my mirror because they left the screws for that at the location that I was leaving. So I have to find someone to do that. I live alone and don’t have a clue on how to do that. I did find the screws at the old address. I also found a complete mess left behind by the workers. At the new location, my living room and dining room furniture was just placed wherever. Three of my nightstands were left wrapped in plastic. I have plenty of pictures if needed. I do not fault the workers. When the worker informed the supervisor of the heavy oak bedroom furniture, assistance should have been immediately provided. Not later. They guys had to leave everything as such because of the time. I could not afford to pay $125 per hour for two additional hours. This is what was needed because of the wasted hours on the “heavy” furniture. Apparently they knew nothing about doing my move. It was a last minute surprise for them. They had just finished a job and was told that this job was only 12 items. Sounds like they were duped into it. Poor preparation on the supervisor’s behalf. Again I do not fault the movers. They asked for help at the onset and were ignored. They were extremely apologetic for the inconvenience. This is by far the worst experience I have ever had with a moving company. I will not recommend this company at all. I will also be contacting the corporate office. I feel like I was robbed. The workers deserved to be paid, because they did their best. They were exhausted. I feel like my cost should have been heavily discounted because the job is inadequate and incomplete. I have to pay out more money to get someone to help sort through the mess left behind. This move cost me $750!!!

text: I hired them to move a business from a storage facility to a store front.  They completely underestimated the size of the truck needed and it ended up costing me more money cause they had to make 2 trips.  They measured and still sent the wrong size truck. After bringing  this to their attention they were to have a meeting and get back with me...NO RESPONSE, NO REFUND bad business.  Buyer beware..call someone else.

resp.text: Mrs. Ratajczack, first and foremost, I apologize that we didn't not live up to the standard of service you expected from us. I went back and reviewed your paperwork and contact logs and I wanted to hopefully clear up some items for you. All of our trucks are 26 feet in length. While we do have two "shorter" trucks in our fleet, it has to do with the height, not the floor space. We did go over on your original estimate by 30 minutes. While we always hope to hit the number spot on, we do sometimes miss and we thoroughly cover and explain to all customers how we bill on actual time used, not the estimate. This was covered in the pre-move email you received on 4/3/2018 and is also covered in item 1 on the Move Service contract that you and all of our customers sign before we begin a move.  Your move notes do say that our men "did a great job" but you were frustrated by the second trip that was made. I did not see however in those notes where a meeting was supposed to take place. If this somehow fell through the cracks, I sincerely apologize and will be happy to speak with you personally about the matter. You can reach me at the office @ 251-316-5977 or by email billy.stovall@twomen.com   While we never like to receive poor reviews, we will learn from it and hopefully improve our service to all customers. I appreciate you taking the time to leave it. Billy Stovall - Owner Two Men And A Truck Mobile, AL

name: Sarah McLeod
text:
3 years ago I used Two Men and a Truck and was very satisfied. Two men moved us from a house to an apartment across town, with a pit stop at a storage unit in between, in 2.5 hours. The guys were amazing. When I needed to move a couple weeks ago, due to my great experience previously, I chose to use this company again.

I don't know what has happened in the last 3 years, but I will never use this company again. They sent 3 guys this time, which would make you think it would take less time, right? No. I moved to an apartment that was 2 lights down from my then current apartment, and we again visited the storage unit, which is down the street from the new apartment. We basically went in a quarter mile triangle.  It took these 3 guys over 6 hours to move the contents of a one bedroom apartment and a small storage unit. They knocked off like 45 minutes for the break they took in the middle, so I paid for 5.5 hours total.

You may be thinking, how much stuff did she buy in that 3 year period?? The only difference between the first time and second time were 2 bookshelves, a chair, and a washer/dryer. With an extra person, they basically took 3 hours to move 2 bookshelves, a chair, and a washer/dryer.

I wanted to give these guys the benefit of the doubt, but after watching them visibly hem and haw at moving my stuff, visibly waste my time and money, I just can't. They mentioned that this company is under new ownership, which may be part of the problem. Maybe these guys get commission, I don't know. All I know is that I paid $925 to move a 1 bedroom apartment and a 5x8 storage unit a quarter mile down the road.

Do not use this company.

resp.text: Hello Sarah, we are so sorry your experience wasn't what you had expected and didn't live up to the high standards we have at Two Men And A Truck. We always try to exceed our customers expectations. I appreciate your review as we always try to use them to make our service better for everyone. Thank you for taking the time to do so. Best wishes in the future.

name: Nick Phillis
text:
ISSUE: Two Men and a Truck charged my card additional amount different from the final invoice WITHOUT permission. Management team did not always conduct professional business. See below:

We used Two Men and a Truck back in February. The crew did a decent job overall. They were hard working, the driver, Nate was exceptional. He had a great work ethic and was super professional and led the group.

My issue is with the management team. There was a discrepancy with the amount of time spent and the amount charged. The driver took off a little time from our final invoice because they spent an hour getting the electric bed upstairs. Essentially what he did was take off the $125 deposit from the quote. I felt like that was fair and I signed the final invoice. At that point I was happy with the move and we went on our merry way.

A few days later, I get an additional $125 charge from them on my credit card. Later that day, the operations manager who I believe his name is Joey, calls me to explain that he charged my card an additional $125 because I was quoted wrong on the final invoice. I explained to him that Nate took the $125 deposit off of the invoice because of the extra time it took them to move things when it shouldn’t have taken that much time. He explained to me that Nate didn’t have that authority and that I will have to pay the $125. I told Joey that I signed the final invoice giving them permission to charge my card for that final amount, in which he has no right to charge my card AGAIN without my permission. He then explained that he felt they have the right. If you give me a final invoice with an amount and I sign it, that is an agreement between the business and the client. A business has no right to change an agreement or amount after it has been signed by both parties. I got a call the next day from another manager to see how the move went. She was very nice and I explained the situation. I explained how I felt I was wronged in that my card was charged again without my permission, how Joey was unprofessional and does not conduct good business. She said that this information would be taken up the chain and people would be made aware. Ultimately nothing was done about it in the end. I just feel like it’s stealing when someone charges your card for an additional amount without permission. Just be aware.

resp.text: Hello Mr. Phillis, We're very sorry to learn of your recent move experience. With a 96% referral rate, we can assure you this is not the norm. We would be happy to speak with you further and encourage you to reach our team at 251-316-5977 so we may help.

name: Thatchic
text: Office staff seemed nice. Apparently they did not ask an important question. I was asked how many bedrooms and the number of items in each. I was also asked about living and dining room furniture. The guys showed up. One experienced, and one not. They started at one on, and by 3:30 they had only cleared one bedroom. My bedroom furniture is very heavy, and the guys were having a hard time. They informed management who brushed them off. I called with a concern about the time. I was told that my oak furniture was the problem. I was asked about quality of furniture on my initial call. This company moved this same furniture for me on a previous occasion. Anyway because of the time they had to leave some stuff behind and go to the drop off location. The supervisor eventually agreed to send help. Long after the mover told them of the problem. Initially I was told that I would have to cover this cost. Once the third guy arrived things went quick. He was experienced. My dresser was not able to be attached to my mirror because they left the screws for that at the location that I was leaving. So I have to find someone to do that. I live alone and don’t have a clue on how to do that. I did find the screws at the old address. I also found a complete mess left behind by the workers. At the new location, my living room and dining room furniture was just placed wherever. Three of my nightstands were left wrapped in plastic. I have plenty of pictures if needed. I do not fault the workers. When the worker informed the supervisor of the heavy oak bedroom furniture, assistance should have been immediately provided. Not later. They guys had to leave everything as such because of the time. I could not afford to pay $125 per hour for two additional hours. This is what was needed because of the wasted hours on the “heavy” furniture. Apparently they knew nothing about doing my move. It was a last minute surprise for them. They had just finished a job and was told that this job was only 12 items. Sounds like they were duped into it. Poor preparation on the supervisor’s behalf. Again I do not fault the movers. They asked for help at the onset and were ignored. They were extremely apologetic for the inconvenience. This is by far the worst experience I have ever had with a moving company. I will not recommend this company at all. I will also be contacting the corporate office. I feel like I was robbed. The workers deserved to be paid, because they did their best. They were exhausted. I feel like my cost should have been heavily discounted because the job is inadequate and incomplete. I have to pay out more money to get someone to help sort through the mess left behind. This move cost me $750!!!

text: I hired them to move a business from a storage facility to a store front.  They completely underestimated the size of the truck needed and it ended up costing me more money cause they had to make 2 trips.  They measured and still sent the wrong size truck. After bringing  this to their attention they were to have a meeting and get back with me...NO RESPONSE, NO REFUND bad business.  Buyer beware..call someone else.

resp.text: Mrs. Ratajczack, first and foremost, I apologize that we didn't not live up to the standard of service you expected from us. I went back and reviewed your paperwork and contact logs and I wanted to hopefully clear up some items for you. All of our trucks are 26 feet in length. While we do have two "shorter" trucks in our fleet, it has to do with the height, not the floor space. We did go over on your original estimate by 30 minutes. While we always hope to hit the number spot on, we do sometimes miss and we thoroughly cover and explain to all customers how we bill on actual time used, not the estimate. This was covered in the pre-move email you received on 4/3/2018 and is also covered in item 1 on the Move Service contract that you and all of our customers sign before we begin a move.  Your move notes do say that our men "did a great job" but you were frustrated by the second trip that was made. I did not see however in those notes where a meeting was supposed to take place. If this somehow fell through the cracks, I sincerely apologize and will be happy to speak with you personally about the matter. You can reach me at the office @ 251-316-5977 or by email billy.stovall@twomen.com   While we never like to receive poor reviews, we will learn from it and hopefully improve our service to all customers. I appreciate you taking the time to leave it. Billy Stovall - Owner Two Men And A Truck Mobile, AL

name: Sarah McLeod
text:
3 years ago I used Two Men and a Truck and was very satisfied. Two men moved us from a house to an apartment across town, with a pit stop at a storage unit in between, in 2.5 hours. The guys were amazing. When I needed to move a couple weeks ago, due to my great experience previously, I chose to use this company again.

I don't know what has happened in the last 3 years, but I will never use this company again. They sent 3 guys this time, which would make you think it would take less time, right? No. I moved to an apartment that was 2 lights down from my then current apartment, and we again visited the storage unit, which is down the street from the new apartment. We basically went in a quarter mile triangle.  It took these 3 guys over 6 hours to move the contents of a one bedroom apartment and a small storage unit. They knocked off like 45 minutes for the break they took in the middle, so I paid for 5.5 hours total.

You may be thinking, how much stuff did she buy in that 3 year period?? The only difference between the first time and second time were 2 bookshelves, a chair, and a washer/dryer. With an extra person, they basically took 3 hours to move 2 bookshelves, a chair, and a washer/dryer.

I wanted to give these guys the benefit of the doubt, but after watching them visibly hem and haw at moving my stuff, visibly waste my time and money, I just can't. They mentioned that this company is under new ownership, which may be part of the problem. Maybe these guys get commission, I don't know. All I know is that I paid $925 to move a 1 bedroom apartment and a 5x8 storage unit a quarter mile down the road.

Do not use this company.

resp.text: Hello Sarah, we are so sorry your experience wasn't what you had expected and didn't live up to the high standards we have at Two Men And A Truck. We always try to exceed our customers expectations. I appreciate your review as we always try to use them to make our service better for everyone. Thank you for taking the time to do so. Best wishes in the future.

name: Terri Hall
text: I have just completed a  large and difficult move! The thing I was most impressed with Crocker Moving was the professionalism, helpfulness and the committed effort made by the movers.  They worked very hard and efficiently!  I want to give a special shout out to Bogden, Richard and David!  These men were so dependable and made sure the team worked well together to get the job done!!! I am appreciative of all their efforts!

name: Nicole Migut
text: Crocker Moving Services was able to accommodate our last minute move out of state. Reasonably priced and movers were professional and very nice! They also moved our 1,500 lb safe.

name: L M Sparks
text: Many thanks to Crocker Moving Services for making the first part of my move easy! I am moving belongings into storage until my new home is available. Katrina did a great job taking care of me through storage location and move date changes! On the day of the move Justin and William called about 30 mins before arrival and arrived on time. After a quick tour of what was to be moved, they got straight to work and had me loaded in less than and hour. At the storage unit, they unloaded my belongings with room to spare. Outstanding job. Fast. Courteous. And very careful with my belongings. Second part of my move is in two weeks and I have no doubts it will go just as smooth! Thank you again Crocker Moving Services and especially Katrina, Justin and William!!!!

name: Jerry Overman
text: I've used Crocker moving services twice. Eric and his team show up, get the job done in a professional manner and treat your property like it' s theirs. I highly recommend them and will use them again if the need arises.

name: Daniel Lowe
text:
Moving is a stressful experience and there are a lot of options out there. I’d heard Crocker advertised on the Leland Live radio show and had a friend who had used them. Could not recommend them more. From the call to schedule to the day-of experience everything was top notch and far more than I really expected. When you call to schedule they will ask a lot of specifics which is designed to have the right size truck. Ours was dead on.

I have to talk about the crew I had: Cam, Elton and Jamal. These guys acted like they were moving their own mother’s things. They were friendly, careful, professional and went above and beyond in everything they did. The entire process took much less time than I had planned on based on how hard they worked and that left me the rest of the day to get settled into our new home. This was the first time I’d ever hired movers and I didn’t know what to expect going into this process based on some stories I’ve heard.

I hope this move is the last one I make for a long time, but if I ever move again Crocker will be the first call I make.

name: Patrick Grant
text: Elton and Tyrone helped us with an in home move to prepare for wood floor refinishing. They were extremely professional and completed the job on time. They took great care with our furniture. We will definitely use Crocker in the future.

name: Garry Taylor
text: Elton, Cam, and Chris did a fantastic job packing our POD.  They were on time, treated our furniture like their own, worked as a team to maximize space, and worked smart and hard, a rare combination these days.  I would recommend Crocker Moving to anyone who needs a helping hand moving, packing, storage, whatever...a professional organization with hard working professional young men who impressed me, and that’s not an easy thing to do- Thank you Crocker Moving and Storage!

name: Rachel Ryan
text:
Fantastic experience. Movers Antwon and Jamaal arrived exactly on time and were pleasant, polite, and helpful—an all-around pleasure. They loaded everything into the truck very quickly AND with extreme care, meaning they were in and out in much less time than originally estimated, which was great for many reasons—most of all, because the less time it took, the more money we saved on the hourly moving fee!

Thanks, Antwon and Jamaal! Because of your good work and great attitude, I would absolutely use Crocker Moving Services again, whether for another international move or a domestic/local one!

You both are assets to the company and I hope your bosses recognize your great work, too! :)

name: Kim Pearson
text: I would highly recommend. They were quick and efficient. Did a great job moving a large heavy piece of furniture from one floor to a lower floor. Perfect gentlemen the entire time they were at my house.

name: Bill Stewart
text:
Every move of personal goods from home to home carries its own unique problems and concerns; mine was no different.  What I found was a company that partnered with me for success and then delivered.  Katrina worked closely with me on schedule and expectations at the front end and closure of the move at the end.  Mike and Johnny managed the loading and loading of my household goods - efficient, positive, problem solving and safe handling. I had no damage; none.

Would I use them again; yes.  Do I recommend them for your moving needs; absolutely.

name: Garry Taylor
text: Elton, Cam, and Chris did a fantastic job packing our POD.  They were on time, treated our furniture like their own, worked as a team to maximize space, and worked smart and hard, a rare combination these days.  I would recommend Crocker Moving to anyone who needs a helping hand moving, packing, storage, whatever...a professional organization with hard working professional young men who impressed me, and that’s not an easy thing to do- Thank you Crocker Moving and Storage!

name: N C
text: The 2 gentlemen did excellent job moving my son. They were very professional and worked hard to get the job done fast. There also NO sticker shock at the end. They explained the price and it was exactly what we were told. I would highly recommend.

name: Jerry Gilbreath
text: Coseen and Antwon did a excellent job on moving my furniture in storage while my apartment is being remodeled. They were on time and worked real hard. I have requested them to come back at the end of the month to put everything back. They both had great attitudes on such a hot day.if all the movers that work there are like them, then you can not go wrong.

name: Jen Harris
text: DJ and Cam were our movers.  Super polite and very knowledgeable about how to maneuver furniture through tight door frames and also dealing with 2 flights of stairs.  I highly recommend Crocker and would definitely request DJ and Cam again.

name: Steven Sikora
text: This group of guys were great. Mike, Elton, Jamal and Prentice were very professional.  When your wife is happy, everyone is happy. I would definitely use Crocker again.

name: Pam Ledford
text: Great experience with the guys moving our items today. They were efficient, careful, and polite. I would definitely hire them again.

name: Rachel Ryan
text:
Fantastic experience. Movers Antwon and Jamaal arrived exactly on time and were pleasant, polite, and helpful—an all-around pleasure. They loaded everything into the truck very quickly AND with extreme care, meaning they were in and out in much less time than originally estimated, which was great for many reasons—most of all, because the less time it took, the more money we saved on the hourly moving fee!

Thanks, Antwon and Jamaal! Because of your good work and great attitude, I would absolutely use Crocker Moving Services again, whether for another international move or a domestic/local one!

You both are assets to the company and I hope your bosses recognize your great work, too! :)

name: Reggie Monypenny
text:
The guys were friendly, hospitable and made a stressful situation easier. They worked very hard and did not waste anytime. We are trying to get a lake house soon and will absolutely use this company. Cam, David, and Justin made our day!
I just read the reviews, one person out of 70 complained. He probably has mommy issues. The entire company is 5 star.

name: steve ames
text: Fantastic service from beginning to end. TCrocker has a great team. I will be using them again. Thanks Leland Live for the tip!

name: Leigh Ann Harchelroad
text: Great movers they worked very fast to get the job done. I would definitely use them again and recommend them.  Antwon and Justin were great and very helpful

name: Karl Swelling
text: They were on time and fast in getting everything out of our house and into our storage unit. I am surprised they managed to get it all in the unit but they packed it well and didn’t damage anything.

name: Tonya Fletcher
text: The two young men did a great job moving me from my home to an upstairs apartment. Very polite and professional

name: karen bumgardner
text: They moved my furniture quickly and safely. Im happy with their service

name: Richard Hill
text: The Crocker team delivered what they advertise from start to finish. The team showed up on time and packed up the truck all the while taking care of the items. They communicated with us and made sure we were satisfied with the placement of items and the job they were doing. I would recommend this group to anyone who ask. Very professional, very personable and easy to deal with. Actually enjoyed and appreciated their company during the long day we spent moving. We will use them again in the future.

name: Matt Graham
text: Dustin and David were awesome. Fast, efficient, effective, and a friendly!

name: Allison Skinner
text: Great team of efficient professionals!  Great job!  Very pleased!

name: Brandon Vanslambroucc 8ck
text:
THIS COMPANY IS EXPENSIVE, SLOW AND NOT PUNCTUAL!!!!!!!   In researching this company I heard nothing but sterling reviews about how affordable and quick they were. 2.5 HOURS LATE, TOOK 5 1/2 HOURS FOR A SIMPLE JOB WHILE BEING PAID BY THE HOUR, COMPANY IS NOT RESPONSIVE TO COMPLAINTS.  Prepare to be shocked when you receive a massive bill like  did for $700+ to move some items down the street.

My mother- in-law was moving less than a mile down the street. I had all of her stuff gift wrapped, packed, and ready to be moved. I even put all of it in the garage. No stairs, narrow hallways, or doors...easy right?

The problems start when they finally arrive 2.5 hours later than the given time. Which is annoying because she could have left work 45 min early instead of taking a vacation day to wait on them.

They finally arrive and begin work. Nearly 5-1/2 hours later they leave. I have no complaint about the work except that it could not all get done due the glacier pace they maintained at $115.00 per hour.

I gave Crocker a call to work this out. While they were understanding, they were unwilling to do anything. Don't be fooled by the Leland Live Talk 99.5 ads or their curated google reviews.

name: Allison middlebrook
text: Had an excellent speedy moving day plus our excellent movers Elton and Tre were MORE than patient, kind and accommodating! Thanks for everything👍

name: Kristi Love Hudgins
text: After Changing Spaces cancelled on my mom's just days before her move. I spent 3 hours calling movers. When I got to Crocker they were willing and ready to move my mom same day. Though my mom ended up using another company I was so impressed with Katrina's kindness, responsiveness, and genuine desire to help in our time of need that I felt it warranted a 5 star review. I don't leave many reviews but they deserve a good one! When need moving services I'll be reaching out to Crocker!

name: Allen Jones
text: Very Proud to say I used this company, They were not only on time and corteous,,,but Extremely caring of my situation. They took care of me and my family situation professionally and quick. No issues at all!!!!! HIghly recommended!!!

name: Karl Swelling
text: They were on time and fast in getting everything out of our house and into our storage unit. I am surprised they managed to get it all in the unit but they packed it well and didn’t damage anything.

name: JRays Channel
text: We used Eric in 2016 and was floored away by the ease of our move. He emailed an invoice and that was the price we paid at the end of the move. Eric and his crew were efficient, friendly and professional. We are moving once again for the military and Crocker moving services will be taking care of it for us! Life happened and I forgot to write a review on the last review. This small business is one of a kind and cares about you and your next move.

resp.text: Thanks so much, we look forward to helping you again.

name: A L
text:
I was very pleased with the movers from Crocker. They worked very hard. We had to go to Talladega to get things from storage then to Hoover to empty my apartment then go to Hanceville. I don't know how they did it. They worked over 10 hours and we were still cutting up with each other when they left.  They did not tear anything up or scratch anything and they were fun and polite and put up with me and my micro managing! 😁
Also, I loved Katrina. She scheduled the move and I feel like she was already a friend of mine. I listen to 99.5 Talk Radio and I kept hearing them talk about Crocker Moving Services and bragging about them. They were telling the truth.
Thanks to all who helped me.

name: Allison middlebrook
text: Had an excellent speedy moving day plus our excellent movers Elton and Tre were MORE than patient, kind and accommodating! Thanks for everything👍

name: Leslie Keith
text: From the very first call to schedule our move to the paperwork to finish the move, everyone involved was detailed, friendly and professional. The movers could NOT have been better! They were quick, meticulous and thoughtful. I cannot believe how easy our move turned out because of this company. I am so grateful and would 1000% recommend them to anyone needing movers. They were careful and efficient and super reasonable, no surprise expenses. Thank you, Crocker Moving, your company made a huge difference!

resp.text: Thank you Leslie for the kind words and recommending us to others. We really appreciate it

name: Tonya Fletcher
text: The two young men did a great job moving me from my home to an upstairs apartment. Very polite and professional

name: Kathryn Damron
text: 2 items didn't  get to my new location. A green lamp , a decorative planter, 3 of my boxes was full of broken glass including a Westminster table clock and glass serving pieces, glasses

name: Keith Mize
text: Great people to deal with and and 30% cheaper than my other quote.

name: Tiffany McKeown
text:
The office personnel were very responsive and helpful with communication and scheduling. We had an unexpected date change (not related to the movers) and they were so helpful with getting us rescheduled. Katrina is an absolute joy to work with.
The crew of 6 men they had working for us were respectful, on time, careful with our possessions, kind and engaging with our children, and very efficient.
I would absolutely recommend Crocker Moving! They made the process as painless as moving can possibly be.

resp.text:
Excellent!  We are very happy that your moving experience was a pleasant one.  If you are in need of anything else, please let us know.
Thank you for allowing us to serve you!

The Staff at Crocker Moving Services

name: Shannon Crim
text: Movers accidentally hit our mailbox.  They notified us and gave us contact information.  Within a couple of weeks the mailbox was replaced

name: Ben
text: Crocker did a fantastic job! They were punctual, efficient, and careful. I highly recommend this company.

name: Space Cadet
text: The 2 guys did a great job loading my Uhaul. Worked hard and friendly and packed it just how I wanted it. Didn't even ask to take a break in 90 degree heat!

name: Lavon Chaney
text: When you entrust someone with all your worldly possessions, you want that person to care about them as much as you do.  And that's exactly what Crocker Moving does! You cannot find a better moving company in this area, and to top it off, it is veteran-owned!  I have no hesitation in referring these guys!

resp.text: Thanks Lavon

text: Competitive pricing, excellent service and communication. Eric was responsive by phone, email and text. We had to make a slight schedule change in an interstate move, and he was able to accommodate without issue. Made this process as easy on us as could be!

resp.text: Thanks Matt, it was a pleasure working with you on your move.

name: Jennifer Bogan
text: Crocker services were very responsive and eager to please. Fair pricing. Very professional and helpful. Would highly recommend.

resp.text: Thanks Jennifer

name: Jo Wiseman
text: Could not have been more pleased with Eric’s moving company. He came by and looked at everything to be moved and estimated time and expense. Day of move guys called to tell me they were on the way. Very prompt! Extremely efficient! Did not see anyone on their phone or lagging behind and not working. Pleasant guys, all working well together!  Would definitely use them again.

name: TenA Sandlin
text: Love love love this company. My husband and I will definitely be using them again. Katrina was awesome to deal with, very personable and knowledgeable and went above and beyond to help us. The crew Brad, Cam and P was fast, careful, professional, respectful and friendly. It was an A plus experience.

resp.text: It was a pleasure to help you with your move.

name: R R
text: We used Crocker on June 19 and it was a great experience. Our crew, Eric, Cam, & Jackson were all professional, efficient, and personable. I highly recommend!

resp.text: Thanks so much

name: Melissa Dixon
text: I've used Crocker moving twice, and I couldn't imagine hiring another company ever again. I interviewed five companies, and Eric Crocker gave me the best price with the guarantee of a professional and hard-working crew. Both times they were prompt, efficient, and such a pleasure to work with. I recommend them to all of my friends and colleagues.

name: Quintin Gaulden
text: Very respectful, outgoing, fun and energetic moving company.

name: Nick Hoard
text: We had such a good experience getting to know Eric, Rose, and Elton on the Crocker Moving team. They are thorough in everything they do and really are a different kind of moving company. Thank you guys!

name: JoEllen Brown
text: I have used company twice to move my children to college apartments. They were excellent movers, professional, and they were lower priced than other companies. I highly recommend Crocker Moving!

name: 205joc313
text: The best moving company I've seen. There fast motivated and it's a great place to work. Owner is also a U.S Veteran!

name: Will Slappey
text: Eric Crocker and his team do excellent work!  They take extra care to make sure everything is packed the right way so your stuff not only gets moved but survives the move.  I found out recently from a friend that they are one of the few (if not the only) moving company in town who does drug tests for their employees – knowing you are getting good responsible people in your house gives a great peace of mind. Crocker seems to have a good price, but I would pay a little extra for the quality they deliver.

name: Julie Gardner
text: Eric is such a professional.  He was right on time.  He made a plan and executed brilliantly.  He took extra care with fragile items and I watched his techniques that many people would miss.  He communicated with me on several areas to make sure that we were both aware of my marks on furniture (my dog put there 2 years ago) so that we were clear.  Eric did a great job.

resp.text: Thank you, Julie! We appreciate the opportunity to serve you!

name: Brandy Suns
text: Eric is a great business owner. I've worked with him on several occasions. They work hard and do things the right way.

name: Brandy Suns
text: Eric is a great business owner. I've worked with him on several occasions. They work hard and do things the right way.

text: I worked at this company and never filled out any application, no drug screen, or hair folicle, test, I was also never had a background test..

name: Cherry Guest
text: Very nice and kind and helpful people

name: Quintin Gaulden
text: Very respectful, outgoing, fun and energetic moving company.

text: Very professional and quick movers. Wonderful experience. Thank you guys!

text: They’re on top of their game. Good people.

text: Good company and honest owner.

name: Mike Cribbs
text: Great company very helpful

resp.text: Thanks Mike

name: Hope Locating
text: Meeting our #HopeApproved Standards

name: beau waldron
text: Stop your search here! Bolt Movers is by far the most professional moving company I have come across. From the contact from the office on the phone to the moving team coming to my home, there was impeccable communication and professionalism. Baylor and Christian were kind, professional, and careful with our belongings. Working through the hot day with a smile on their face. They even seemed HAPPY to rearrange items in our new home when we needed them moved to another room. My wife and I will not move with anyone else!

name: Erica DeSpain
text: We hired BOLT Movers to move us a few miles across town and our experience was near perfect. The movers were professional, skilled, and always on time. The pricing was clear, and though it was a bit more than some competitors, we felt that we absolutely received better service than we would have with any competitors. TJ was the lead and he was phenomenal. We will strongly recommend BOLT to our family and friends. In a real estate climate that's ever-changing, flexibility was key and BOLT was there for us. Thank you Bolt! -Erica

name: Roni Garayanala
text: I would highly recommend Bolt movers to anyone needing to move locally.  Arrival was slightly earlier than expected with a phone call to confirm my apartment / building location.  TJ and Ian were very professional, honest, and friendly, walking through each room to make sure nothing was missed while quickly planning out the best way to load their moving truck.  They were quick to ask questions and make sure things were moved and positioned in the correct place.  Great work on accomplishing the move much faster than expected!

name: Amy Akel
text: Bolt movers was lifesaving to us at the end of a very long, hard day! Our movers Baylor, Conner, and Ian did an exceptional job. They worked efficiently and with a kind demeanor, even after being given a job that was more than they were initially assigned. Would recommend this company and their excellent movers to everyone! We hope these guys get the recognition they deserve. Even our parents raved about how great they were!

name: Kimberly Speciale
text: Jarrod, Joshua, and Jackson recently helped my family with a move and we could not be any happier with their service and the way everything turned out!  The crew was friendly, respectful, and provided high quality work, ensuring all of our items were carefully handled.  This is our 3rd time using Bolt movers and we are impressed each time.  I highly recommend this company!

name: Lynn Randleman
text: Sam and James at the Auburn location were top notch! We moved from one apartment to another and they couldn't have been more professional. It was raining off and on, so they took great care to wrap our furniture and even protect our floors from the mud by moving everything out, then load on the truck. I would definitely recommend Bolt, and especially Sam and James!

name: Tim Umstead
text:
TJ and Baylor did an excellent job with everything. They were extremely courteous throughout the whole move. Packed our stuff quickly and professionally.

Could not have asked for a better job. I definitely recommend anyone moving should call Bolt.

name: John Anderson
text: We did a local move within Madison County.  The Bolt team showed up with 7, very professional and courteous movers.  They did an excellent job taking care of both the homes and the furniture they moved.  I would highly recommend.  A shout out to the team:  Ian Barrier, Jack Hodges, Joshua Hall, Rashawn Greene, Christian Eichelberger, Conner Cooper and Timothy Edwards.

name: Kyle Cossey
text: I recently used Bolt Movers (Rashawn and Sam J) to move a mix of large furniture and boxes to a new house across town in Huntsville. They were a great combination of friendly, professional, and efficient while getting the job done. Would definitely use again and recommend Bolt Movers to others. Overall, I was very pleased with service and cost.

name: Mel Reiner
text:
We were incredibly pleased with how kind, efficient and professional both Sam and Rashawn were with helping us move 3 floors up.
They went above and beyond to make our move run as smoothly as possible, and we sincerely appreciated all of help.  Thank you, and we will use Boot Movers again when our house is built.

name: Nancy Romanoff
text: TJ and Rashawn were awesome movers. They were on time, friendly, strong and very careful with our furniture. I would highly recommend Bolt Movers but would ask for these two guys specifically.

name: John Crocker
text: Bolt Movers packed and moved 2 truckloads of our items in a professional and efficient manner which my family and I truly appreciate . I highly recommend them for your next move.

name: Ycmcelyea McElyea
text: TJ and Rashawn are a wonderful team.  They helped us move to our new home.   Worked well together and got the move done easily and in a timely manner.  Would recommend them and Bolt Movers.

name: Marrisa Harris
text: It was a pleasure to do business with Bolt Movers. Isaiah, Leo, and TJ were very efficient and pleasant. They got everything done in a timely manner.

name: Likhit Somboon
text: Highly recommend Bolt Movers to everyone. We just move to Huntsville and very happy with delivery services from Bolt Movers. They are professional and friendly staff, Zero damage, quick and on time delivery, flexible and fair price. We will use their service again for sure. Thank you to Patrick and his team.

resp.text: Mr. Likhit, it was our pleasure to serve you! Thank you for the kind words.

name: William Greenwalt
text: The Bolt Moving folks did a great job!  They moved the furniture quickly and placed it into our new home exactly where we wanted it.  A special thanks goes to Landon Brown and Sam Johnson for doing such a good job, and thanks to Mariah and Abigale who coordinated the move.

name: John Petit
text:
I am very satisfied with Bolt movers!  Mariah helped me in booking and scheduling the move.  It’s was a two city move so I had some concerns on arrival time and how it would go.
On the day of the move Baylor and Jackson arrived on time, were very professional, got right to work and both had great attitudes!  They wrapped and loaded everything carefully and arrived at the new address on time.  Everything was unloaded in less than two hours!  I highly recommend Bolt!

name: Tanya Carter
text: I recently hired Bolt to load a moving truck. TJ and Rashad did an excellent job. They were courteous and hard working. I enjoyed meeting them and would highly recommend Bolt for any moving needs.

name: Bradley Dean
text: Bolt Movers did a great job with our move!! We would totally use them again in the future. They got everything to fit in our storage pod and were very careful with our items as they moved them out of the house. Extremely nice guys and professional guys too.

resp.text: We appreciate the kind words and will be glad to help you in the future.

name: Lindsey Ellison
text: Once they arrived I had a great experience with my move. TJ and Gabe did an excellent job and were quick and efficient while also taking care of all of my belongings. I would definitely recommend Bolt Movers!

name: Camille Preston
text: Patrick and his crew did an excellent job. They moved all the large furniture, including our baby grand piano from out of a 2 story 4600 sq ft home. Patrick, Colt and the rest of the team were super friendly and very hard working! They took apart our beds and reassembled everything we asked and placed our furniture where we liked. This was by far the best moving experience we have ever had and my family will be sure to recommend the Huntsville Bolt moving team! Thanks guys!!!

resp.text: We appreciate the kind words! We will be glad to help anytime you need us.

name: Stacy
text: Timothy & Lemar were wonderful. They were quick, friendly, professional, and efficient. We would definitely recommend Bolt and will use them again in the future if needed.

name: John Gibson
text:
We just used Bolt movers today to move out of our house and couldn't be happier. We had several antique pieces of furniture and a piano that they moved with ease. The move was accomplished without any damages to furniture or house. They were professional in appearance and had good attitudes. We could tell that they were interested in doing a good job for us.
And then to top all that, they finished under the quoted price. Two thumbs up. Five stars. Will definitely recommend to family and friends. Heaven help me if we move again, we will use Bolt movers without thinking twice.

resp.text:
We appreciate the kind words John!

It has been a pleasure doing business with you.

name: Stephanie Pierce
text: I had Bolt Movers help me out with some donations I needed picked up for a client. Everyone one through the whole process was really helpful. Justine, who I talked to for scheduling was friendly and responded quickly while I was working to get things scheduled and Tannon and Hunter who came to pick up were efficient and took care to wrap the cushions of the couch the client was donating. I would definitely work with Bolt Movers again and would recommend to anyone else looking for a good local moving company.

resp.text: We are very happy that you had a great experience with us Stephanie! Thanks for leaving a review & kindly reach out to us if you need any further assistance!

name: Frances Clayton
text: We have used Bolt Movers several times over the past three weeks. Their customer service is excellent and the movers do an outstanding  and thorough job packing, moving, and unloading all items. We will definitely use them again in a few weeks when moving one of our daughters. Give them a try!!!

resp.text: We appreciate your kind words! Bolt Movers is here to serve all of your moving needs.

name: Alan Brown
text: Brett and Johnathan did an excellent job moving all my furniture into the new house, even though the narrow hallways and oddly spaced doors made it challenging. They maneuvered with finesse and more importantly they did not get mad at me when I changed my mind about where the couch should go. Excellent service!

name: Jana Killen
text: Some of the hardest working men we've seen!  Personable and care about pleasing their customer and took great care to not damage anything... Thanks, Patrick, Lewis & Joe!!!  You guys did a heck of a job and we so appreciate you!!!  Highly recommend BOLT MOVERS to any and all!

She was kind and asked all of the right questions to ensure a seamless process on the day of the move, plus they were able to fit us in on short notice. The guys worked quickly and quietly and were great about keeping us informed on their timeline for both pickup and delivery. I'll be using Bolt for any future moves!

name: Jeff Sanders
text: Gave an honest quote over the phone. Called the day before to confirm final details. Showed up on time and brought a truck that was well able to move my items (see photo). Had protective cloths for my dining room table set. Moving to a 3 floor Apt wasn't an issue for them. They were kind, respectful, and easy to communicate with. We were able to move my stuff in a short amount of time. They even helped set up my furniture. Would recommend their services to anyone. Will use them again in the future.

name: Nicole Dasher
text: Company was invaluable at helping secure my move. They took care of packimg and unpacking and even secured my space for me and left my keys with my storage company. Above and beyond.

name: Greg Maynard
text: Outstanding service. They communicated well through the whole process leading up to the move. I would highly recommend using them if you have any moving needs.

name: Sharday Yorkshire
text: In January 2020 I had the pleasure of working with Moving the Coast of Orange Beach. They moved me from Florida to Louisiana. If you are looking for a company that is professional and on time... look no further. This companies professionalism is unparallel to any other I've worked with in the past. Thank you for making my move easy and totally stress free. God bless your company.

name: Todd Williams
text: My wife and I just used them on a short local move and they guys were prompt & professional. Cost was in line.  I would highly recommend them!

name: Makenzie Willis
text:
Very polite and on time. Didn't charge extra fees.
It was a very smooth and professional move.
I would recommend them to anybody.

name: Sand Marcus
text: They took our call last min around 7PM and was able to arrange a crew to come over 20 mins later to move a large dresser up a flight of stairs. They were fast, efficient, and easy to deal with. They will be getting our business again in the future.

name: Scott Rodgers
text: Wesley, Austin, and Caleb were very professional, careful, and good speed of work. Very reasonable rates and overall very good moving company. I would highly recommend using Henderson Moving and my family will be using them in the future.

name: Amanda Reed
text: Best moving experience ever!  We've used moving companies in the past that has just made the experience dreadful - bad attitudes, move like slugs etc.   These guys were all extremely friendly, courteous, quick movers.  They also did an amazing job of handling our things and making sure nothing was damaged.  Highly recommend, and I will definitely use them again in the future.  Can't say enough good things about them!

name: Eric Godsey
text: Straightforward with pricing, no hidden fees.  Very polite workers, safe and fast.  Would use again and recommend.

name: Emily Campbell
text: I have never in my life received such awful service. We have rescheduled my delivery 3 times and they keep not showing up nor contacting me. I have to reach out to them to even figure out that they aren’t delivering my package on said say. Also, I couldn’t seem to ever get anyone on the phone and when I did they were always giving me the run around. I would like at this point to just go get my package, but I CANNOT GET ANYONE ON THE PHONE!! Terrible, terrible service! I do not recommend them!!

name: Terry Starkey
text:
Great Delivery! The guys arrived ahead of time
(they did call and give me 45 minutes notice). They were pleasant and allowed me to check the Dresser out for any damage. Absolutley perfect! Thanks very much!

name: Chelsey Karr
text: Very appreciative of this company. They went out of their way to deliver tile we had ordered to our home in a timely manner. Can't speak highly enough about them.

name: Katlin Welborn
text: My dining table was unfortunately delayed by the manufacturer and the day before Thanksgiving was my last chance to get it! I called and spoke to the owner and he arranged for me to pick it up just a few hours after it arrived at their location! They were quick at loading it when we arrived and I was so thankful they allowed us to change the delivery plan to accommodate the holiday!

name: M Curtis
text:
While the manager called me by the wrong name several times, that is not a huge deal. I had to re-schedule delivery because I was out of town. I was told rudely she would have to call me back to do that. Once I finally heard back I was told a certain day and time, verified by my wife while phone was on speaker. I had to pay extra money for my child to stay in daycare because of the time of delivery. Nobody showed up at that time. After attempting to get the "manager" on the phone for one and a half hours, she informs me she messed up and got the day wrong. I then informed her how unprofessional this company is. The "manager" then went on to raise her voice and told me everybody makes mistakes! Now I have to get off work, again and pay extra child care cost.. again. And hope they show up this time for the delivery.

DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY

resp.text:
We are sorry to hear that you had an unpleasant experience with Henderson Moving & Transfer. We strive our best to provide friendly and prompt service for our customers, and apologize for the inconvenience.

We would greatly appreciate the opportunity to make your next experience with us a great one.

name: Monica Wiley
text: They did a great job in moving my items into my new home. They were very friendly and careful with my items.

name: DEEPoSEAN_
text: Fast, courteous, and on time. Moved my couch into my apartment without any fuss. Driver/mover called ahead of time, to give me a time frame for arrival. Would recommend to anyone moving large furniture.

name: Mary Ann Burgdorf
text: I had ordered white glove delivery service for an extra $150. Two young kids arrived and had to ask me to borrow a knife to open the boxes. That’s different. No white gloves and they didn’t seem to know what they were doing. They got the bed together and were leaving so I went back to look at it. Stains on the side of the upholstered bed frame so I refused it. I saw them load the bed back in the truck like it was firewood. They were supposed to have open the boxes at their warehouse and inspected it for damages which apparently they did not do. I was scared having them in my house.

name: Zack Nabras
text: They lost my shipments I called Over 60 time  they  don’t answer Given you run around bad service do not waste your money on your time

name: Melissa McAbee
text: My shipment was delivered on the promised day and early in the delivery window; communication was brief but professional and all in all it was a very easy, quick delivery.  After several poor experiences with much larger moving companies I'm glad to find a local one that treated me and my shipment with respect.

name: harrisonkl
text: i think they are GREAT.  The office staff is very polite,caring and compassionate and the moving crews are careful and diligent while not wasting time.  I engaged Henderson Moving to help with a very complicated move.  I am moving my elderly Mother from a Condo at the same time I am moving from a place out in the country.  We are moving in together in the family home.  We are doing this in several small moves and everyone at Henderson has gone out of their was to be helpful.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review! We really appreciate it!

name: sandra jones
text: Henderson Transport and Storage is the BEST! Very customer service oriented! They keep you informed and they call the day prior to delivery and about 30 minutes just before delivery. The guys have delivered several very big and very heavy items from wayfair, and they are so gracious and pleasant! Such good service is one of the reasons I look at Wayfair first, I know that Henderson Transport will do the end delivery!

name: Blair Gilliland
text: Still have not received my desk and hutch from Wayfair. It was scheduled to be delivered on Friday September 6, from 2-6 and never showed up. Called the number several times that day, throughout the weekend, and this week so far. No one ever answers it or returns my messages. The voicemail is a woman's voice. She says Uh a lot and pauses so I can tell this is a personal number and just a couple folks running a "business" which terrifies me. Especially after seeing these other poor reviews, I'm worried IF my desk shows up at all it will be damaged and I'll have to refuse it and order a new one. This is a seemingly hopeless process and I do not recommend this company!

name: David Champion
text: Horrible delivery experience. Was schedule for delivery on Friday September 13th between 6pm and 9pm. Waited around all afternoon and never received items. Never even received a phone call or anything. Tried calling office and what do you know, they are only open until 2 pm. So I called wayfair and they rescheduled delivery with Henderson. Here it is September 19th and still nothing. I will not order anything else from wayfair if it’s delivered to me via Henderson.

name: jason baugh
text: They delivered my sofa within 2 days. They called and gave us updates as to when they would arrive. They brought it in and sat it where I wanted it. I was very pleased.

resp.text: Thanks for the great review Jason! We really appreciate it!

name: Joan Prance
text: I have never in my life been treated like the owner of this company treated me.  I was called Monday and the deliver was set up for Wednesday at 6.  I am moving into an apartment from a house.  I waited and waiting and nothing.  I looked back at my confirmation email and it said that the delivery window was between 6 and 10 at night.  I was livid.  I had to call my ex to pick up my daughter at church at 7:30 because they never got to my apartment.  My daughter came to me and I had to keep her up on a school night.  I waited until  10 and still no call.  When I finally got them to answer on Thursday, the lady was extremely rude.  She said that the truck broke down which is understandable.  She said that her guys called everyone, but I never received a call.  She then said that she would deliver it Saturday at 5.  My daughter has a recital at 7 and I am sure they will not be there at 5.  I ask if they could come any early and she said that there are 20 people ahead of me.  I am not happy.  This company is awful and ran by rude, rude people.

resp.text: We are sorry to hear that you had an unpleasant experience with Henderson Moving & Transfer.
