text: Beat moving company in town!

name: Aisha Thorn
text: Chase, Rankin and Terik where amazing. They went above and beyond and made our move incredibly easy. These young men were kind, courteous and hardworking. I highly recommend them.

name: Jesse Mwakajumba
text: Justin Honeycutt and his crew were absolutely incredible, best moving experience we've ever had. What's typically a very stressful experience for anyone's that's ever moved, they made it very doable after wife and I had a stress week of prepping for the move. Would highly recommend them to everyone, just be prepared and organized to make things easier for both you and the movers and everything will work out just fine.

name: S Rumphrey
text: They did a great job. They were very fast and professional. I had to move to a storage unit and they packed everything in there really nicely. I will use them again when we move the items out of the storage unit

name: Linda Barber
text: I'm 71 years old. When I moved, I moved a freezer full of food. When they moved it to my apartment, it was days before I realized they had not plugged the freezer in. I lost about $2000.00 worth of food.

name: Robbie Hinds
text: Kenneth and Dallas helped me out with packing my 2 bedroom apartment. The packing service was professional and succinct. When they moved my items into storage, they were professional and courteous with how my items would be treated in storage. Thank you guys! You deserve a raise!

name: David N.
text: Movers were very professional. I believe they did a great job. It was a little more expensive than the estimate but did take a little more time.

name: Nicholas Hall
text: Called up the easy movers to pickup some pieces at my house and load them up into my storage unit in alabaster. No complaints. Movers were quick and friendly.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Hall! We appreciate the kind words and look forward to assisting you with any upcoming moves!

name: Debbie Williams
text: So glad a friend recommended Easy Movers to us. They were on time, had positive attitudes the entire day. Made our move from our home of 35yrs seem easy. 2 trucks, moved us 2hrs north and 11hrs later when they finished were still upbeat and positive. Very reasonable pricing. Call them!

name: Roll Tide
text: Zach and CJ showed up early, ready to get the job done, and courteous.  They worked extremely hard, fast, efficiency, and carefully.  I highly recommend them and will be using them again in the near future.  I would give them a 10 star review if google allowed it!

name: Steven Henderson
text: Flawless move! They are great guys! Had a good time and got it done quickly!

name: Jennifer LaFrance
text: I am pleased with the outcome.. I did have a piece of furniture that was broken that I would like  to inquire about how do you handle that.. The movers were personable, very helpful, and wirjed very hard.. They had a great attitude!!

name: Marion Fields
text: Rob & Chris were 30 minutes late, one or the other was missing during the 6 hours they were working for me with excuses I still don’t understand. I was lied to by both of them for promising to come back the next day to finish the job I was promised from the start. I ended up finishing the job myself because no phone calls were returned. BAD SERVICE!

name: niyoshi harris
text: I will never use this company ever again. Although the two guys that were sent , last min I was told because someone called off were nice but I feel really didn’t have great care on how to properly handle my furniture etc due to several damages and scratches found. And then above all my bill was cheap either.

name: Dee Burke
text: I've used Easy Moves before and my experience was Awesome. My most recent experience with them went well also. They guys arrived on time and moved my things quickly. A few more chips and scratches than I was expecting. Overall I'm still satisfied.

name: Dave & Joyce Taylor
text: James, Dallas, Rod did a fantastic job enjoyed working with them.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review! We're glad to hear that our crew did a fantastic job! We look forward to hearing from y'all again soon!

name: Will White
text: DO NOT use this company!  DISHONEST!!!! We scheduled a month ahead of time and had to be out of our house this weekend.  I called to confirm yesterday.  “Robert” called me at 7:30 am saying they were running a few minutes behind but would be there at 9.  At 9 he called and said they could not complete the move until next week because they only had enough workers for one truck “because of COVId”.  His “solution” at 9:15 on the day of our move was to give me the phone number of other moving companies.  I called the first number be gave me and it was closed.  I called him back and he offered me more phone numbers (I guess they know how to use Google at least).  I told him just to send the one truck he had, and he said he released them because I “didn’t want to split my move”.  This was a LIE as I never uttered anything close to those words.  I told him it was his job to find a solution. 2 hours later I’m sitting in a house ready to move and have not heard back from Robert.

name: Amber Crutcher
text: If I could give this company ZERO STARS I would!! The movers were absolutely careless with my belongings! I tipped each worker very well before I could see the damage they’ve done. My boxes weren’t properly taped so all of my belongings fell from the bottom as soon as I picked it up. They also left in a hurry after they helped me move into my apartment and I wasn’t quite sure why. It wasn’t until I realized my BRAND NEW dining table was completely scuffed up on all of the sides!  Also, two of my TVs are now broken. One of the TVs was also brand new but is now cracked. Very disappointed with this company! I would NOT recommend this company. You’re better off moving your belongings yourself!

name: Beverly Cole-Luchansky
text:
I truly regret using this company. I relocated from Alabama to Georgia and used this company to move some of my belongings into a pod. Well, the movers that arrived were not prepared to move much of the items they were to move. Because I was in Georgia, my realtor agreed to oversee the move. She called me stating that the guys were cramming things in the pod haphazardly and was certain that many of the items would be damaged as they didn't bring any supplies to wrap or disassemble the items(e.g. Exercise mirror, bowflex treadmill). They were willing to scratch up the paint on my walls bringing the fully assembled gym equipment out of the room because they were not equipped with tools.

They finally agreed to go to the office building to get tools to bring back. So, what was to be a three hour move turned into an EIGHT HOUR move.

Lastly, my realtor told the head crew member to leave the key in the opened lockbox when they were done with the move. She wasn't able to stay on site for eight hours. The guys agreed to do so. She texted them about 30 minutes after they'd left the house, askin if they'd left the key in the lock box as instructed. The mover stated that he did NOT plave the key in the box but that he'd left the key under the mat on the front porch(below the OPENED lockbox). When she asked why he didn't leave the key in the lockbox, the mover responded, there's nothing we can do about it now, we've left.

The next morning the appraiser came to the home and the key was NOT under the mat. So, I had to reschedule my home inspection and pay a locksmith to change my locks. Especially since I still had a zero turn mower(10k), golf cart and other valuables still in my home that my husband was coming back to remove a couple days after they moved the items.

I really feel their plan was to come back with the key and remove some of my belongings from the home. Why else would they agree to place the key in a lock box that was already "opened" and located above the mat they claimed they placed the key under. Makes no sense.

So, I decided to write a review. Only after trying to reach out to the owner several times about the issue of the key and never receiving a response. I did speak with the Operations manager and he was very nonchalant and rude. My realtor and I were both on the line and he wouldn't allow either of us to speak on the issues. He was very defensive and talked over us the entire time.

I ended the call thinking, the most I can hope for is that my equipment in the pod isn't damaged when it arrives to Georgia and to just be grateful I changed my locks before whomever made it back with the key they "wilfully failed" to place in the opened lock box just above the mat they claimed they placed the key under.

I truly encourage anyone searching for a moving company to please find another one. Moving is stressful enough. The last thing you need is to work with a company who's unprofessional and lack common decency and respect in servicing their clients. I wouldn't wish my experience on anyone.

name: E Henry
text: The movers was very courteous and efficient. They of my items took time and care.

name: Clara White
text: We had them scheduled to come move furniture out of our house at 8 AM. They kept calling and saying they were going to be late, until they eventually told us that they had all mysteriously caught covid. I find it quite funny that this beautiful Saturday on Halloween they all caught covid from some miracle when they didn’t have it this morning. Absolutely terrible service. We have to move out tomorrow and they stranded us.

name: Deleen Alley
text: Horrible personnel, rude, things broken, please if you value your surroundings do not use.

name: K P
text:
Buyer beware: Please do not use this company for your next move unless you want to risk damage to your property without recourse. Easy Moves moved some items for me on March 25, 2020. The movers irreparably damaged one of my valued items during the move, and did not disclose the damage until after I had paid for the move. I called Mike, the store manager, to report the damage. Mike assured me that he would either replace or compensate me for the loss. However, after numerous calls, messages, and emails, I have yet to hear from the company. Mike is dodging my calls and refusing to keep his word regarding compensation for damaging my property. I am so disappointed that I operated in good faith only to be lied to and avoided. I wouldn’t recommend this company to anyone. If I could give them a zero rating, I would gladly. Poor customer service practices and low customer value are my experiences with Easy Moves.

Update: 4/18/2020 No response

name: Marianne McGehee
text: I moved a few weeks ago and chose this company because of their competitive price. I couldn't be more pleased with my decision, they were quick, helpful, super nice, and very careful with my items. I would definitely use them again!

resp.text: Thank you for your review Mrs. McGehee! We're glad to hear your kind words of our crew! We look forward to helping you with your future moving needs!

name: Jenny Duke
text: BEST moving experience ever!!!!! Everything went absolutely perfect from start to finish and had the most amazing crew handling our move for the big day! It poured rain the entire moving process but it did not phase them nor their efforts to hard work every minute that day! I cannot thank Easy Moves and the crew that was assigned to us enough for the peace of mind they gave me with an awesome moving experience!

name: April Carlisle
text:
BUYER BEWARE!!!! DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY!!!!! YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED !!!!
This was the WORST moving experience. We had big tickets items that were damaged. The only thing that they are going to “repair” is the scratches on the dining room table, not the air hockey table, not our 65 inch tv or broken glass on our patio set. I will be consulting with an attorney to see about my rights. This is awful. Use another company. They gave us the run around and wouldn’t return phone calls.

name: Cindy King
text: On a positive note... The team that came to move my things into a storage facility were very courteous, professional and worked like a well oiled machine. Can't say enough good things about the team.  The only reason for the three stars is lack of communication and organization within the company.  I had to delay the meet time at first. It was originally scheduled for noon. They gladly rescheduled for 3 - 3:30. Then they called (which was appreciated) delaying it until 5:30-6:00. This is where the problem came in. There was another 3 1/2 hour delay (which I had great difficulty reaching anyone) that created all sorts of issues. If communication had been more fluid and timing more accurate, it would have gone much smoother. I had a separate trailer to unload that night and I could have taken it to the other location, unloaded, ate dinner and returned within this period of time. They didn't arrive until 9:00 p.m.  I had to just sit and wait at the storage facility because I was not given an accurate time table to go by. This left a very sour taste for this company. Summary Score: Team A, Communication D-.

name: Catherine Harrison
text: I recently hired Easy Moves to move a piano up a flight of stairs. I was really nervous about this but Easy Moves sent experts who knew how to get the piano up the stairs without scratching the floors or walls.  I was really pleased with they guys who came.  The were very friendly and got the job done quickly and made it look simple.  I would definitely hire them again!

name: James Montgomery
text: Very pleasant, very cooperative and I would recommend these guys to anyone that needs help moving!

resp.text: We're glad to hear that, Mr. Montgomery! Thank you for your recommendation!

name: Shaquita Young
text:
WOW! I am so thankful that I was able to book these movers with less than a weeks notice.

I was doing a long distance move from Birmingham, AL To Columbia, SC. The quotes I received from
Competitors were about $2500 more than what I paid here for the same exact services.

I was very busy leading up to the day of the move but the office was in constant contact with me making sure they could do whatever I needed to make the process simple and stress free.

The day of the more, two workers met my friend in Alabama and after a delay on my part (the key didn’t work so the lock had to be cut), they got everything loaded, and hit the road. They arrived at my new location and unloaded and set up everything.

Despite the southern heat, their attitudes were pleasant and their work ethic was top notch. I would HIGHLY recommend this company to anyone.

I would also like to mention that their response to messages was very quick. I have left messages at other places of business and gotten responses 1-2 business days later.

name: Tommy Watkins
text: Movers were on-time and professional minus few hiccups. My biggest issue was rendering my payment method Eazy Move writes you card information down and process at their leisure please avoid this process as this process is not someday or next day. Matthews is avoiding my call regarding running my payment method. I am simply trying to clear my books. I will not use this service again due to an antiquated payment system and my card number out their in limbo.

name: Kelli Agnew
text: These folks did an incredible job of moving.  They were extremely professional, helpful, and they were on time!  I highly recommend Easy Moves.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review Mrs. Agnew! We'll be sure to let the crew hear of your kind words! We look forward to serving you in the future!

name: Martha Austin
text: We used Easy Moves this past weekend.  This was the first time we have ever hired movers.  I would definitely recommend these guys!  They were the best quote I got by far.  They didn't hound me to chose their company, they let their prices and professionalism speak for themselves.  The guys called before they showed up.  The worked hard, even through a lovely little storm that came through.  Then soaking wet they unloaded at our new home.  The final price was better than I expected by far! They offered to go out and replace a book case that got damaged in the move (the fact that they were honest enough to let us know it happened was amazing). And it was a very cheap book case handled by young boys.  No surprise that it had an issue.  They were so polite and helpful.  Going out of their way to not only do their job but try to assist in all the other little tasks I was doing that day.  Really can't say enough good things about these guys.  Hope to never move again, but if I do I will only make one call next time.

name: Obie Moore
text: Great company with great people. Showed up on time with two guys and went straight to work and took care of me very promptly and professionally. Would recommend these guys highly to anyone who's planning a move across town or across country

name: Brittany Sanders
text: I hired this company to move a dresser and chest from one home to another one across town. The movers knocked down a brick column/post outside the 2nd home. The movers promptly reported this to their supervisor, but I still haven’t received a return call.  I previously used this company when I moved 3 years ago...I don’t know what has changed, but I WOULD NOT recommend hiring this company if you value your belongings. I also recommended them to a friend who had a glass shelf damaged during a Recent move

name: Felicia Lewis Wiggs
text: I was very impressed with the way Easy moves handled my move from my apartment to my house.  They made my move go pretty smoothly.  It was Steven, Marquis and Acoyre.  These are the three guys you want when you are looking for a reliable moving company.  They were on time with arrival and worked efficient and quick to get me moved.  I was very impressed with them and will be using them again if I ever move.  If I'm satisfied, then I'm a repeat customer. Thank you Easy moves for making my move easy!!!

name: Bob Duncan
text: Great service from a great company! Have used them for personal residential moves as well as they are my go to delivery company for my furniture store I own. Always prompt and efficient with the time and best of all have outstanding representatives. Great job EASY MOVES

name: Dylan Pearson
text: Very unprofessional, cussed at my mother and canceled the job. Going to be fined now because I can’t move out by 5pm today.

name: Kesta Harry
text: This was by far the best moving experience I have had to date. I would recommend Easy Moves Moving&Storage to all my family and friends.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review Mrs. Harry! We are more than grateful for your review and look forward to serving you in the future!

name: Donnie Alleman
text: Had an awesome experience with this moving company and look forward to using them again in the future, they went above and beyond expectations! Excellent work!

resp.text: Thank you for your review Mr. Alleman! We're glad to hear that our crew went above and beyond! We look forward to serving you in the future!

name: Jessica hood
text:
FYI.....Do NOT USE Easy Moves for moving!!!! We used them about 4 years ago and they were great. Then we used them a couple weeks ago for our move and it was the worst experience we have ever had with a moving company. We started at 9:00am and they did not leave our home till 11:30pm. A lot of our furniture was scratched and our walls were hit. My husbands gun came up missing and we found the gun case thrown behind our deep freezer. They busted our 60inch tv. We told them we would pay half that night and we would settle up with the owner the next day because of our experience. My husband said make sure you have him call me. The next day we heard nothing. My husband called 4 times and emailed 2. The owner did not call him for 3 days. Then he said he would look into it. He got one of his employees to call my husband back and tell him they were going to send a company out to repair our furniture. The furniture company called and my husband ask how exactly they go about repairing the furniture and they said with a furniture pen 🤔. Umm no thanks. My husband tried to call him back multiple times. The owner never handled business and we have heard nothing from him! This all happened on April 30th. When my husband told the employee that we had such a good experience before with this company and he is not sure what happened, the employee stated, “ well you paid top notch for those movers.” My husband said well that’s funny because this move was more expensive 🤔🤔🤔

VERY unprofessional not to mention they have a thief working for them. We filed a police report but there was nothing else we could do! Just a warning!! They do not respect your time, your money, nor your belongings.

name: Gabby Humber
text: I highly recommend Easy Moves! They were very easy to communicate with beforehand and even accommodated having to move the time back a few hours the day of due to troubles with the U-haul. Our movers were Tyler and Chris. They did an awesome job and were very friendly. Easy Moves is an awesome company that I will be using again. Thanks, guys!

name: Michael Noles
text: Great guys. I had very heavy furniture. One of the guys dropped a mirror. It did not break but it scratch the floor is the little bit. No harm. But I hustle to get the job done well worth the money.

name: Nick Fullington
text: Absolutely fantastic experience. I rent Trucks & Storage for a living so through positive word of mouth I was told to use this company for my personal move & I could not have been more pleased. They were efficient, professional, & seemed legitimately happy to be doing the job. I would use them again in an instant.

name: Rodney Cameron
text: Robbie, Jeremiah, and Will were AMAZING!!!  Best movers we’ve ever had and we’ve moved many times.  We highly recommend this company!   They went above and beyond and exceeded all of our expectations in every way.

name: Kathy Shores
text: Due to a family emergency, I was out of town during my move. The owner of the company was very accommodating and reassured me that the move would go smoothly.  They are a reliable, affordable, and dependable company and  would definitely use them again.

name: Isha Jallow
text: By far THE WORST company ever. Ashley is a compulsive liar. She is the receptionist!!! Mathew is a absurd “manager” I’m not sure if he is even the real manager. They were very unprofessional, used profanity, FAILED to give their REQUIRED service. We asked for a refund for some of the money and they wrote a false check. These people are BAD NEWS. Look for another moving company while your at it! GOODLUCK !!!!

name: Mustafa Muneer
text: Tyler & Lucas came 30minutes before and were ready to go. Tyler explained everything in detail. Tyler and Lucas took care of our move quick and efficiently. They even helped throw an old swing away. 100% would use Eazy Moves again. Thanks!!!

name: Tracy Reid
text: I am and will always be a repeat customer for Easy Moves. They are highly recommended.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review Mrs. Reid! We are more than grateful for your repeat business and look forward to serving you in the future!

name: Donna Kimbrell
text: Great company! They did an amazing job. Very professional and took great care of my possessions. Thanks for a job well done!

name: Connie Edwards
text: We have used Easy Moves several times and every single time we have had a wonderful experience.  Chandler and Acorye did a fantastic job for us!  Everything was moved with care.  Nothing was damaged! Both guys were kind and even entertaining! Big thank you to both Chandler, Acorye and the staff behind the scenes that makes a big job easy and enjoyable!

name: Cayla Johnson
text:
I would highly recommend them for moving. They are kind, professional and have great communication throughout the process.
Being an Active Duty family we have had many bad experiences with movers, but they are fair priced and overall a great company.

name: Rebecca Oldroyd
text:
After spending almost nine months in a local hotel because of water damage at our house, Easy Moves helped us get moved home and begin the process of settling back in. As you can imagine, we accumulated quite a bit at the hotel, and since both my husband and I are disabled, we needed assistance.

James, who put together the work order and handled scheduling, was pleasant and willing to accommodate our unexpected, last-minute request to delay the start time on the morning of the move. Chandler and Cade met us at the hotel, loaded our belongings, drove them home, and unloaded everything. They then moved the contents of our kitchen and DR (which had been stored temporarily in our utility room while renovations took place) back into the house. These young men were friendly, willing to unload and set up items wherever we asked, and careful with our belongings. Easy Moves charges by the hour (a practice that some companies might abuse), but these guys really hustled. Rates were reasonable, we were impressed with the level of service, and we’d definitely use them again.

name: Jamie Mccoy
text: Easy Moves is a great company. First time I have used a service to move. Was very nervous. The people At the office were great and helpful and the three guys who did the move were awesome!! Other companies were going to charge a fortune but these guys gave me a quote and it was actually cheaper! Thank you Easy Moves!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review! We are beyond grateful that you chose to move with us! Using a moving service can be a very nerve-wracking experience and we are glad everything went smoothly for you. If you ever need our help again we will be more than happy to help!

name: Brooke Davidson
text: I am in the property management industry, so I meet and see a TON of different moving companies, but this company here is by far the ABSOLUTE best. Such hard workers and wonderful management. My current property recently had a fire which meant a lot of residents were displaced and Easy Moves were able to help the majority of them. After speaking with the residents, they all said they would hands down use them for any future moves. Thanks for the hard work guys! Keep it up!!

resp.text: We appreciate the review and kind words Brooke! We hope we are able to help in the future!

name: Justin & Mandy Laddie
text: Devery & his team at Easy Moves were professional, personable and extremely accommodating during an extremely stressful and difficult move. I can not express how thankful I am to have chosen Easy Moves. They did an amazing job for a fair price!

name: Rhonda Kendrick
text: Acorye and Stephen were hands down the best moving guys that we have ever seen!! We were so impressed with how much they handled every single detail! I would recommend this company 100%!! Thanks guys!!

name: joshua bailey
text: Great movers very friendly!!! We use easy moves and recommend them every time thanks for help us at ESS

name: Justin Heberling
text: We had a fire at our home and had to move out and move back in a few weeks later. Devri and his team were excellent to work with through every step. Devri went above and beyond by helping to arrange for storage when we couldn't get a container delivered in time among other things. I would highly recommend Easy Moves to anyone needing moving services.

name: Van Price
text: Moved all our furniture including 2 safes, one weighing about 1400 pounds, thru a tight hall entrance. They did not make a single scratch or mark on any surface. Great guys and great job. Thanks for your help.

name: Erica Kendrick
text: These guys were amazing! Stephan and Acorye helped me move to Georgia and they were awesome. I would recommend to anyone

name: Janice Poole
text:
Update: This company has moved me twice in the last 2 years. Both times they did an excellent job!  They we’re professional, polite and I paid exactly what I was quoted. This is a great company and will do an amazing job for you, as well!

Easy Moves handled the move for my aunt and did an amazing job.  Fast and professional.  I will be using them for my move in a few months.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Janice! We look forward to serving you on your future moves!

name: Craig Winn
text: Easy Moves did a great job with the move. We have a small business with 9 employees and really big desks. Lots of heavy book boxes and file cabinets. They came in and worked very hard. They took care to wrap the furniture and reassemble everything on the other end. I was very impressed. We had some issues with the estimate and final costs but even that was done with concern for our well being.

name: Brenda Adams
text: Great job

resp.text: Thank you for the review, Brenda! If you ever need moving services in the future be sure to give us a call!

name: Phillip Stotler
text: I have always been too proud to hire movers in the past, but a friend encouraged me to consider saving my time and potentially my joints this time around. He highly recommended Easy Moves, and I am very happy that I took his advice. Getting a quote was quick and easy. The guys showed up a little ealy, which we didnt mind. Tyler and Talon were exceptionally efficient, competent, and friendly. They took outstanding care of our stuff, our house, and communicated very well throughout. Were also great about helping out with a few extra tasks. Super professional crew. Very impressed with the company and would definitely recommend to anyone looking to make moving day less stressful.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review Mr. Stotler! We know that hiring movers can be stressful and we're so very glad that you entrusted us with your move. We wish you the best in your beautiful new home!

name: R M
text: Chandler, Devontay, and Steve were awesome! They were very nice gentlemen who clearly took pride in their work. They worked quickly and with a lot of energy and enthusiasm. They took great care of my family's belongings. Would recommend these guys in a heartbeat, and will use them again myself if the need arises. A big thank you again!

resp.text: You're welcome, thank you for the kind review! We're glad Chandler, Devonte and Steve were able to help!

name: TERRY HENLEY
text: The movers were efficent, timely, and fast. We got everything out without any problems. Nothing broken or lost. They were good at organizing things. When they wasnt sure about what goes where, they asked, i like that, no assumptionsp

name: Gymnast Audrey Gault
text: I just used Easy Moves for the second time. They were efficient, professional, careful and very affordable.  I highly recommend them and definitely would use them again.

name: William Collins
text: Devri, the owner, was very accommodating in helping us get all set up. I was not able to be at the house, but my wife was there. She was very comfortable with the movers and they did a great job with the heavy items. I recommend them to everyone I can.

name: Ashley C
text: Devri is hardworking, professional, and reliable. When you need to make a move- big or small- go to Easy Moves Moving & Storage!!!

name: Marti Daniels
text: Fantastic job! Moved a 150 year old China cabinet and a piano. They paid attention to detail and were very patient. I never thought I would meet a more professional group of movers. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!

resp.text: Thank you Marti for the positive feedback! We look forward to helping you with any of your future moving needs!

name: Cathy Harris
text: Steve, Will, Vaughn & Chandler did a fantastic job packing and moving our home to storage!  I can't say enough about how professional they all were. They worked hard and got the job done!  It was a lot to pack, move and store.  They treated all of our belongings like they were their own. They even had to find some things we didn't mean to store and they went the extra mile to help me find what I was looking for!  All this completed on two very hot days!  Thanks, guys!! I'll call again for our next move!!

resp.text: Thank you Cathy for the kind words and great review! I'm glad Steve, Will, Vaughan and Chandler were able to make your move as easy as possible. We hope to hear from you soon for your next move!

name: kcabc2012
text: Once again these guys did a fantastic job for us!! They were professional, patient, kind and helped make the whole moving process fun if there is such a thing! A big thank you to Brady, Baxter and Will for all their hard work in incredibly hot weather!! But even more for their upbeat attitudes and kindness!!

resp.text: Thank you so much! We appreciate the repeat business and are glad Brady, Baxter and Will were able to help you out! Please let us know if we can ever be of service to you again in the future!

name: Lucretia McCarter
text: Great movers. Thry were fast, efficient and kind.

name: Lori Siebe
text: Easy Moves gave us an excellent price on our move.  They easily handled a very heavy safe & took great care of our things with all of the special wrapping.  We would definitely hire this company again, because they take great pride in doing a good job, they completed in a great time frame, they were personable, knowledgeable, & very hard working!  Thanks guys!!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Lori! We appreciate the opportunity to ensure the safety of your home while moving your heavy gun safe and we look forward to serving you in the future for any of your moving needs!

name: Karen Sykes
text: Brady and Kevin are the best movers I have had to date!This is the second time I have used Easy Moves and the first move went just as good! I can not tell you how polite and helpful these guys were! Moving is stressful and overwhelming but theses guys made it actually an enjoyable day again. name: Adam Truitt
text: These guys are the greatest! They've earned my business for life. Devri and Trent run a tight ship and are truly experts in their field. I've been consistently impressed with their professionalism, knowledge and execution of work for years. These are the guys to call people!

name: Michelle Roberts
text: I manage a storage facility and deal with many moving companies.  I highly recommend Easy Moves.  They are professional, efficient and incredibly polite.  Their customer service is just outstanding.

resp.text: We appreciate the kind words Michelle, and will continue to uphold our professionalism, politeness and efficiency!

name: Kincey Ribeiro
text:
We recently called Easy Moves and were told a crew would be out our old apartment on Saturday, March 30 between 12 and 2 P.M. On the phone and through our various email exchanges they sounded as if they were genuinely interested in our business!  Not only did Mr. Devri Hensley II ensure us that a crew would be there, he promised to maintain an open flow of communication with us, so we’d know what to expect.
The only problem with all of this was that they didn’t show up on the agreed upon date and time. Then we had another problem. No response. None whatsoever. Our numerous calls and voicemails have gone unanswered, ever since.
Now, since they have still failed to call us back or provide explanation, I’ll ask the questions here with hopes of getting some sort of response below:
First, why have you done this to us? It was pretty awful having to call friends and family, last minute, to help us move, quickly. (They appreciate you too, by the way.) We would have simply tried another moving company if you had only said something along the lines of, “No sir, we can’t move you that day, we’re booked full.” Or if there were another reason that made sense, maybe we could have understood. After all, we consider ourselves pretty understanding. But not now.
Why won’t you return our phone calls and emails? We understand stuff happens, but you’re running a business. Now you’ve just made yourself look completely and utterly incompetent. If that’s what you’re going for, because it seems to be, then congratulations!
And lastly, I have to ask, why did you decide to open this business? Sometimes it’s okay to admit when you’re wrong. Maybe you should reconsider this.
But in all seriousness, unless you like being suddenly caught in overly-anxious situations, I’d suggest everyone steer clear of Easy Moves.

name: Davida Franklin
text: From the initial call to the move, all was excellent.  Great price, punctual and efficient.  Tim Shaw and Markeez were the actual movers and were very efficient, quick and very pleasant to work with.  It was a simple but great move.  Thanks for your service.

resp.text: We appreciate the positive feedback Davida! We hope we can help you again in the future!

They saved us time, money, took good care of our things and were so polite. Hopefully we don't move again soon, but I hope these guys are available when we do.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review Lindsey! We're glad Brady, Kevin and Markezz were able to make your move so great. Please let us know if we can be of service in the future!

name: D One
text: The only thing positive thing I can say about my experience with Easy Moves is that the young gentlemen who moved me were nice. That's it. I believe the majority of the 4 & 5 star reviews posted online were from their friends just to boost their ratings and I'm in agreement with "Ian I" who used their services 4 months ago who stated they will damage your merchandise and never return your calls. That's exactly what happened to me. They pretend as if they want to resolve the problem but never return your call. As a customer, it is not my responsibility to continuously reach out to you to resolve a problem you caused. I should have went with my gut and hired their competitor (also in Pelham) At least I would have received 5 star quality service and wouldn't have to deal with aftermath issues. Would I recommend to a friend...NO. Would I recommend their competitor...YES!

text: Super-nice, knowledgeable people, huge selection, and they gave me a great deal!  Loved that I could try out so many different keyboards hands-on.  Highly recommend!

text: Great selection of name brand pianos and organs including Yamaha and Hammond.  Their prices are very reasonable for what they sell.

name: Anna Soltani
text: I spoke in-depth with David Ellis about a Yamaha grand piano and he was very knowledgeable and extremely honest. He gave me so much of his time. I truly valued his opinion and would highly recommend Ellis Piano!

name: Fred Westrom
text:
Ellis Piano is a too notch shop.

They have a little of everything,
From entry level electric pianos,
All the way up to the nicest concert grands that money can buy.

You will not find a piano store with a better selection, and definitely not with nicer people.

They are not pushy, and are so friendly that they will spend a little extra time to show you how cool the products that you wish you could afford are.

If you are thinking of getting a piano, this is definitely the place to go, explore, play, learn, and eventually buy the piano that is right for you, and maybe even the piano of your dreams one day too.

Ask for Jason Ellis, and if you think of it, tell him that I sent you.

I am sure that you will be as impressed and satisfied as I have been with them.

name: Valencia King
text: Very friendly staff. Really good people. Awesome pianos.

name: john condon
text: (review by full-time pro-musician) Ellis is awesome! And take note, David Lambert is the in-house electronic repair "wizard" with a degree in Electrical Engineering. Awesome inventory of acoustic and the best in elec keys including NORD, KAWAI, ROLAND, YAMAHA, etc. Plus hybrids which are the latest designs that combine acoustic/elec by using a whole new trigger system that's NOT the midi triggers on each key which slows down the action. It's a completely new technology you have to see. Btw, if you walk in and don't know it there's a room in the back with over a $million in concert grands that blew my mind!

name: Jonathan Hart
text: Fantastic family-owned business! I was in the market looking for a new digital piano, and decided to check the place out. Got to talking with one of the family members named Jason about all sorts of piano-related topics. He showed me around the place, helped me get familiar with the layout of the store, answered questions I had about their keyboards, and overall was extremely helpful. Extremely passionate about what he does as well — I enjoyed discussing some of their piano history with him. Ended up purchasing a Roland FP-30 along with a stand and bench for a fantastic price! If you're in the market for anything piano-related, I would highly suggest Ellis Piano!

name: Christy Donovan
text: Our favorite piano music store. We try to visit every so often when we are in the Birmingham area. Great selection of music, and plenty of pianos to play it on to see if we like it.

name: Kristi Gill
text:
I went in for some general information and Cory helped me tremendously
5 stars go ellis oiano

text: ❤️🎹❤️ Ellis Piano Store in Birmingham, Alabama, is filled with people who truly have compassion for their customers! Their dedication to excellence is off the charts! I have been shopping at Ellis for over ten years, and every time I walk into the store, they treat me like loving family! They have the very best pianos, accessories, and music at the very best prices! I am beyond pleased with the piano I bought from them! Every time I visit Ellis Piano Store I am blessed! It is the best and most loving family business I have ever seen! It will always be my favorite store!

I was helped and allowed to browse through music and this adventure has added to my desire to begin playing My piano again .  I will definitely be back!

text: Had a great experience shopping here.  They were super patient while I looked at used pianos and then helpful when I finally made my decision to go electric. And they checked back in with me months later to make sure an accessory had arrived.  Thanks y'all!

text: These guys really made my dream come true of owning a Nord Piano  the customer service is outstanding ! Thank you guys! They are out doing their competition

text: The purchase of my piano made a lifelong dream come true. Completing the experience was the service of the Ellis family. Family owned businesses have a pride and mindset like no other. I cannot imagine a better experience and am deeply grateful. Sincerely, Allen Jones

name: Allison Walls
text: If you're in need of a piano or keyboard, this is the place to go.  They are not only experts in their field, but they will make you feel extremely comfortable and right at home.  My mom is a private piano teacher and has shopped here for as long as I can remember.  They have, by far, the best selection in Alabama, and their floor room is filled with absolutely beautiful pianos.  Mr. Ellis and his sons are honest and loyal, and we will never buy from anywhere else.  Do yourself a favor when piano shopping and just make one stop here.

name: Tiffany Walls
text: Mr. Ellis and his sons are amazingly kind, knowledgeable and honest. My wife's family have been friends and patrons of Mr. Ellis for decades. We would recommend Ellis Piano for the purchase or repair of your piano. You'll never feel more like family than you would here. The store is set up beautifully and these guys will take the time to walk you through features, the history of each piano and feel out your needs to make sure you find the perfect addition to your home and family.

name: Luca Guazzotto
text: Great store for piano buyers. Cory and David are very helpful. They will spend the time to knowledgeably talk with you about the various instruments and to let you try on even the ones that are above your goal or budget. They won't press you into buying anything, nor try to convince you that some expensive piano is "the best piano in the world" or that some cheap one is a great deal. I didn't buy a piano, but I will definitely be back for one when I am ready.

name: Brian Farrar
text: Talk about a class act organization. My wife and I purchased a baby grand piano from this loving and welcoming establishment in September  of 2017. After having the instrument in our home for 4 months 2 keys at the very far end of the piano were sticking. I called Mr. Ellis told him the problem and he sent out a professional to fix it in a very timely manner. Not only did they fix the 30 second minor problem Mr. Ellis had my piano tuned at no expense to us. If that is not customer service I don't know what is. If anyone who reads this post is contemplating purchasing a piano please please please rest assure from the time you meet Mr. Ellis, his sons, and the staff that work there, you will be well taken care of. These people are genuine from the word go. They will assist you if you know absolutely nothing about  a piano to help you find the right instrument for you. Words cannot express how wonderful this business is. Thank you, thank you, thank you Ellis Piano & Organ for being who you are.

name: Enoch Ko
text: I recently purchased a Yamaha gc2 from Ellis Piano. Mr. Ellis and Cory were fantastic from showing me their inventory all the way to purchasing. Very approachable and down to earth people. Fantastic people. They could not have made the buying experience any easier. Piano also arrived quickly and I could not be happier with the purchase. Highly recommended.

name: Andrew Carter
text: They have a great selection of pianos and sheet music!!! Music for all skill levels and all genres! Music Staff is super friendly, very knowledgeable and always willing to help!

name: David Porter
text: You might as well call this "World of Pianos" because it is FILLED with beautiful new and used instruments. Mr. Ellis and his sons are wonderful people who will go out of their way to help and will work with you to get the right piano in your home. They have a wealth of experience and knowledge. If you are thinking of buying a new or used piano, sheet music or electronic keyboard, you owe it to yourself to check with Ellis Piano.

name: Kim Beverage
text: Ellis piano is simply THE BEST place to not only buy a piano but to enjoy the experience of doing so.  Purchasing a piano is a matter of very personal taste and preference...what matters most to David Ellis and his sons is quite simply whatever matters most to you.  My husband recently surprised me by taking me to Ellis to pick out the piano of my dreams.  While they could have pushed me to purchase on the spot, they did exactly the opposite and accommodated me on multiple visits to make certain I went home with the instrument I not only liked....but with which I fell in love (as did my husband).  They went out of their way to educate us about the instruments and encouraged me not to settle.  Not once did I feel pushed to make a purchase.  David and his sons knew this was a very special gift from my husband and they went above and beyond to make sure it was all he wanted for me...and all I wanted as well.  The Ellis family knows pianos, they know the value of a good investment, they know the value of superior customer service, they are approachable and meet every pianist on their level - from the young child just beginning lessons to the most accomplished world-renown performers and everyone in between and they treat them all with the same utmost care and respect.  When you select a piano from Ellis, you receive not only a stellar instrument suited just for you, but also the benefit of a family legacy based on fulfilling musicians’ dreams.  If you’re in the market for a piano, question no further where you should go...Ellis Piano is your answer.

name: April Hebert
text: I couldn’t say enough good things about All My Sons. They were extremely easy to work with and very professional. Emily, Garrett and Cameron did an exceptional job moving us out of our old home and into our new home. They took great care of our things and were very kind and respectful. They were a perfect balance of careful and speedy. All around a great experience and I would highly recommend them over and over again.

resp.text: April thank you for 5 stars!

name: Jasmine Jordan
text: If there was a way to give 0 stars I would. We had a terrible experience with this company. We called 3 weeks prior to move and set up the appointment for 8 am. We get a call 3 days before move in saying “we don’t think we will be able to make it to you”. Which is an  absurd excuse when we were the first people of the day. Do not book with this company because this is terrible business. We chose this company because we heard great things and that impression was not left. They then proceeded to ask if we could move the next day as if we don’t work full time jobs and can just take off when we want to. I cannot express how disappointed I am in this company and their ways of handling such ordeals. Please re consider before booking with them if you don’t want your plans canceled last minute. And please don’t hit me with sorry for the inconvenience cause that’s absolute bull. Be a better company and live up to your google reviews cause the service was trash.

name: Bonnie Whitener
text: The movers I had--Garret, Gary, and Sam--were excellent. I had nothing broken and they set some of my furniture up for me. Garrett even carried my geriatric 60lb dog up two solid flights of stairs for me. All of them were respectful of my things and how difficult a move it was. They were very kind to me and I recommend asking for them by name. They make a great team and  deserve 5+stars. The biggest difficulty I had was with management. I needed my whole house packed. I commute 300 miles a week for my job and the biggest reason I contacted movers was for packing help. For whatever reason, this message did not get across to those who set up the move. This caused my move to be delayed for a day. It was only because Garret, Gary, and Sam came the following day with extra materials that I was packed up and moved out so efficiently. I recommend this company, these three movers in particular, but be crystal clear about your expectations when speaking to management.

Didn’t say anything to me and left his manager to call me to tell me he didn’t feel the home was ready. This is after I specifically told this boy what was to be moved and what isn’t. They don’t tell me how I should have my home set up for a move, I’m paying them!!! Move and focus on only what I tell you to focus on, simple! Luckily we had another moving company to help us, which was less expensive! I would never use or recommend anyone to use this careless company for moving purposes!

That person was on their phone MULTIPLE times until they saw I was watching and they would put it down. I called the office while they were driving to the new place and told them about my problems and they told me they would tel that person to “pep it up” as if my money wasn’t being wasted. They also stopped at a gas station for 30 minutes and ended up behind us because they were thirsty. I understand the importance of hydration, but not while I’m paying for the time. Once they finally arrived, the  crew member did NOT “pep it up” and they lost a bottom part of one of my shelves so it sits crooked. I used this company in the past and had no issues but I will NEVER use them again after this experience and their unwillingness to make it right.

text: I will never be using this service again and would not recommend it to any one!! It was an absolute scam, as I have moved multiple times and have NEVER been charged this much for movers. When I called to verify why I was being charged $250 more than originally promised, they claimed it was a “travel fee” for the movers to travel to my apartment in downtown Birmingham. This was never explained to me and it’s absolutely ridiculous that I paid ~$400 for 1.5 hours of work for the movers to load 15 items into the uhaul that I provided!!! And I I tipped the movers $40 without knowing about these extra “travel fees” so my total was $420. Absolutely ridiculous!

name: tori horton
text: Please read before you consider doing business with this company. They do not wear proper PPE(masks completely off, etc) when entering homes. This company lacks professionalism and decency. They do not value your time either. I hired this company a week in advance to move big items out of my home. I called first at 10am to get a time frame on when they’d arrive and they said within an hr. That hr turned into close to 6hrs. The only explanation i could think of is they were traveling on the other side of God’s back to get to my home. When they entered my place, they did not have on masks and they smelled like they took a lengthy break to get high. They entered the home briefly, asked a question, then left out saying they were getting the truck ready. There I was waiting for an hr or so for them to return and they did not. I spoke with their manager over the phone and he said they wouldn’t be returning with no explanation. I explained to him that the guys did not say anything other than they’d be back after getting the truck ready. The manager was uncooperative and hung up in my face. This whole process has been a nightmare. Please avoid this company when moving, it’ll save you a lot of time and energy. If i could give 0 stars i would.

text: Save yourself some trouble and do not use this company. They were supposed to show up yesterday to move us into our new home and called the morning of to inform me that the crew who was supposed to move us “did not show up.” Things happen, so I said okay and was told that another crew may be able to come later in the day after performing their first job. About 6 hours pass, and I have to call back again to find out that there would be no other crew coming, “we can reschedule to tomorrow morning between 8:30-8:45” so I said okay. Tomorrow morning arrives and the movers are an hour late. I call again and am told that they’re “on their way, probably just getting gas.” After waiting another hour and still not having movers, I call again. This time it’s “well there was a mix up and your movers were sent to a different location, but they can be there in about 3 hours.” At that point, I canceled because I wasn’t about to be burned again, and there was no real effort being made to reconcile on the part of the company. I will say that the people of the phone were pleasant enough, but every time you call you wait on hold and are connected with someone different. I will certainly never attempt to use All My Sons again.

name: Courtney Vaughn
text:
My movers were Tommy and Skye, and I couldn’t have asked for anyone better! They called me about 30 minutes before arriving, and got to work as soon as they got there. They were both super friendly and professional. I am moving out of a basement unit, so I was afraid the stairs would be a challenge. They handled my furniture carefully and were sure to load it up in the right order. I had (key word: HAD) a couch that was going to be a beast to get up my stairs, and I asked them to take it apart so I could get rid of it. They got that thing apart in no time!

When we got to my new apartment, they were quick to unload everything and get it situated exactly how I wanted. They even offered to help put my bed and kitchen table back together for me! These guys are awesome!

Also, the pricing of All My Sons is incredible. These guys worked in the July heat for right at three hours and I could not believe how low the cost was, considering the work! I compared several moving companies and decided on All My Sons after one conversation with Hannah. Everyone I have dealt with has been both professional and nice, which is a rare combination these days!

I definitely give this experience an 11/10 and will recommend All My Sons to anyone I know who needs a hand! Thanks!

name: Melynda Buck
text:
I called about 30 days in advance to schedule my move for August 8, 2020.  I was told I would have four guys to move a three bedroom apartment fourteen miles down the road.  My package included all blankets and wrapping material to protect my furniture.
Needless to say this move was anything but pleasant. The moving crew showed up 45 minutes late.  The moving crew supervisor quite before the furniture was completely loaded.   I repeatedly call Brad (owner & manager) with every negligent action that occurred with the remaining moving crew.  I had damage to my new hardwood floor, busted freshly painted door frames, knocked a hole in my ceiling, broken dresser handles, strap indentions on bedroom dresser and slid my leather couch across the cement front porch shredding the side corners. Beds were made to look like they were put together but not one single crew was installed.  I found this out when I went to but sheets on the beds and they fell apart.  I was also told all furniture was off the truck when I discovered my bedroom nightstand was missing.  I found this and a busted chest of drawers with clothes spread out under blankets so I would not find them. Brads response was for me not to worry about it that he’d take care of me.
All boxes, TV’s, and hanging clothes were moved independently.  They were strictly moving furniture.
I did everything I was instructed to do to file my claim and have yet to hear back from the insurance company.  My confirmation email stated it would take 30 days to process.  It has now been 60 days and I haven’t heard a word.
I will say Brad was very pleasant every time I called and listened to all my complaints but the downfall in any business is lack of action in customer service.

name: Madeline Goodwill
text:
****EDIT TO ADD****
Motivated movers was able to get the same size truck in with no problem! They were great to work with and very professional. Give them a call instead!!

I scheduled to move with All My Sons a month in advance for a move this morning. The crew pulled up to my house, and with out attempting to use the back access drive, calls me and says the 26 foot truck they brought wouldn’t fit due to a power line. The driver said he would speak to his manager, pick up a 13 foot truck, and call me back with an update shortly. After an hour with no call, I called the customer service line. I spoke with the manager who apathetically said they didn’t have the truck needed to move me, so they could refund me my deposit but they couldn’t move me within the next three days. Unsatisfied with his response and lack of customer service ask to speak with his supervisor. His supervisor is the owner of the company and basically gave me the same regurgitated answer the manager did. They didn’t even bother to call me and let me know my move was cancelled, I had to call them. I wouldn’t even recommend All My Sons to even my worst enemy. They can expect a call from the Better Business Bureau.

The 3 guys (Matthew, Gary and Trent) showed up on time, did an excellent job wrapping all furniture with a great system and organization in the truck for safety. They communicated while driving to Atlanta about stopping for food and few checkpoints on how far out they were. We were never worried about our stuff. Moving is stressful especially Out of state/distance moves..but they made it stress free and painless. I would highly recommend using them for your move.

name: Carla Shirley
text: I used all my sons to move from one house to another. The gentlemen in the office were great, and worked with me on my closing and delivery of my son in the midst of scheduling the movers. They showed up on Saturday the 26th of December and one of them had on house shoes. It was 2 males and one female, they worked fast, but once we arrived at the new house for them to unload the truck they walked around and looked lost. I watch the female drop my bedside table, then they hurried and left without putting my kitchen table back together that they took apart, or putting my tv back on the stand they took it off of to move it. I’ve called and spoke to Larry about the matter at hand which was of course all my fault, and I have yet to hear from customer service on the damages done to my belongings. I will not recommend using this company unless you have the ability to micromanage them the entire time they’re there. Half of my boxes are missing, and no one at the company cares to help find the boxes or help with my belongings. Also I was quoted one amount, and charged double that amount, even with the damages and missing items.

name: Danni Freeman
text: So not happy with this business. Would Not recommend them. Will never use them again!! We moved 5.6 miles down the road. They had no boxes to move only furniture. We took the bed apart and the mirror off our dresser. There was no sofa to move.  This still took them 8 hours to complete! They took multiple smoke breaks. Moved at a turtles pace. Argued with each other. Bad mouthed my husband when they did not realize I was standing right behind them. Took an hour lunch break when they are only allowed 30 minutes. When we called to ask where they were they stated they had to stop and run a few errands. They scratched up multiple pieces of furniture. Put dents in the floor and walls. But what really really was the final straw and what prompted me to post this review was the fact we are about to paint so pulled out dresser out and found a huge hole in the back!!!! Instead of being honest about it they thought they could hide it bc how often to pull out large furniture. You can't miss it either it is right by where the mirror attaches. Refer back to where I stated we took that mirror off ourselves.. that is how I know it was not damaged prior. The bedroom set is only 1 year old. Super upset by the entire experience.

name: Maine E
text: They will say anything under the sun and will be extremely nice and attentive to get your business, but if you have any issues after your move don't expect any results. Movers didn't put my headboard on. I didn't notice because they made it look like they did. Sent email with pics and asked someone to come back out. No response for a week. Finally spoke with manager and requested a refund of deposit. He agreed. It's literally been over a month, and I still have not gotten my refund and now the manager is completely ignoring all my calls, VMs, and texts. Customer service is awful, I will literally never use them again. Would not recommend. And to think I was considering recommending them for our office relocation. Nope. Not to mention they sweet talked me into the higher package with more movers because it would "save me money" but it took 3 guys almost 5 hours to move a 1 bedroom apartment that was already packed up.

text: I called to get estimate 2 weeks before move and they gave me a range of 800-900 dollars.  The day before move, I got a call telling me that the person quoted me wrong over the phone and it would be about double the price.  I called around to find another company but no one had availability next day so I had to keep my appointment.  Some stuff was damaged but no point to company fix it.  Also, you can't tip on a credit card, you have to give them cash or a check so they don't pay payroll taxes on it.

name: Garret Allen
text: Excellent group of guys with a hard work ethic and great attitude.

resp.text:
Thank you so much for your kind words, Garret. We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us.

Cheers,

All My Sons Moving & Storage

name: Meagan Crockett
text: AWFUL. They arrived late. We ordered 2 trucks and only 1 showed up. They still charged us for 2 trucks. The movers were SLOW. One mover was on his phone most of the time. It took nearly 12 hours to get only half of the boxes and furniture out of the house. Then they where going to charge extra to come back out the next day. They did not care that they made moving day stressful and frustrating. Absolutely HORRIBLE customer service.

name: Leslie Cook
text: Oh my gosh,  I am so happy I went with this company.  Dustyn, Andrew, and Colin are superstars.  They made my move fun and exciting.   I cannot say enough great things about this company.   I had to reschedule more than once and they treated me like I was their too priority.  From start to finish All My Sons are phenomenal!!! Thanks again guys!!!

name: Tammy Nix
text: Joshua Edison is a very organized young man.  He and his associates were able to move a very unorganized storage unit to an apartment in less than two hours.  Very professional.

resp.text: Hi, Tammy. Thank you so much for leaving us a stellar review!

name: Linda Lowden
text: Friend used them & they only moved half her stuff. 15 min drive & they headed toward another city!

name: Will King
text: Kebarius & Shane were to two movers that arrived and helped us move our furniture on today. They got to our apartment around 8:30 a.m. and once they packed up everything ok the truck and went to the furniture store and picked up some furniture and bought it to our new house. These two young men put together both our beds and they were so professional and respectful. I recommend that these two you men get a raise because you don't find people doing this kind of hard labor and able to do it all in decent time. They're a GREAT asset to your company.

resp.text: Hi, Will. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it!

name: Sherry Coleman
text: Jay was very nice and accommodating. We appreciate his service.

resp.text:
Sherry  Thanks for 5 stars! We appreciate you!

Thank You
All My Sons Moving & Storage

name: Erin Baumgartner
text: The moving experience was great! Jay, Chris and Gary went above and beyond in my move to Atlanta during these extraordinary times it COVID19. Even though the move required transporting everything  up three flights of stairs, they took this in stride. To top off, they then moved a number of heavy furniture items to a loft via a wrought iron staircase. They did all of this with a sense of good humor and grace, even though they did not leave until nearly 11:00pm. I cannot speak highly enough of their ethic. A heartfelt thank you to each of them!!

name: T “TA2543” A
text: Jay and Tee did a great job moving me across state lines. They worked efficiently and carefully and there was no damage to any of my stuff!

resp.text: Hi, T. We are thrilled to learn that you had a positive experience with us!

name: Andrew Dean
text:
Brad, Ben and Hannah did a great job managing my expectations of the move. They were great in response to any questions or concerns that I had. Josh and the crew that moved us in did a great job as well. They worked hard and efficiently. They did have an issue with one of my entertainment centers but Brad and his team helped make it right.

Call Brad or Hannah today if you need to move.

name: Heath Hood
text: Damaged multiple pieces of furniture including damaging a book case. They took the book case and then refused to replace it. Damaged walls, dented and damaged both refrigerators. Offered $104 as settlement for thousands in damage. DO NOT USE!

name: Tyler Lewallen
text: Great service. Great price. Super fast and friendly. Would use them again in a heartbeat.

resp.text:
Tyler  Thanks for 5 stars! We appreciate you!

Thank You
All My Sons Moving & Storage

name: Amanda Stephens
text: Cassandra and the whole crew were very efficient and professional. Definitely recommend this company.

resp.text:
Thank you for taking the time to share your experience!

Thank you!

name: Ashlea Andrews
text: This was my second move with All My Sons and just like last time, they were amazing. Nate and TD were fantastic. So friendly and so fast!!! I was amazed at how quickly they moved everything and they even handled every special request and stop that I needed them to make quickly and efficiently. I 100 percent recommend them and will be using them again the next time I need movers.

name: Michael Huff
text: Amazing service from the telephone staff to the movers. Amazingly fast, never stopped, safe, careful with our belongings. Couldn't speak more highly of the company as a whole.

resp.text:
Thank you for taking the time to share your experience!

Thank you!

name: Mr Smith
text: Chipped few glass pieces and said nothing.... in fact they Hid them. Did not reassemble anything and rushed out at end.  Will not be using again

name: Valerie Boyd
text: WOW!!!! I am so happy to write a 5 star review for All My Sons Moving! My family and I have moved 3 times in the past few years and we have NEVER had the experience like we did with AMS!!! From the very first phone call in talking with Nate to the 4 men crew that came while it was pouring down raining and their can do fun attitudes, it was just awesome! They were so careful with our belongings and made sure we were happy the whole way through! Thank you team Nate, Colin, Tommy, Dustin and Adam!!! Y’all made us feel like family!!!! 😀👏🏼

name: James Schauer
text: Thomas Hart and his crew showed up on time , worked hard, and did a fine job during our recent local move.

resp.text: Hi, James. Your feedback is highly appreciated. Thank you for the review!

name: William
text: Didn’t put me on schedule.  Just charged me for deposit and sent conf email. Waited 3 hours with moving truck at storage unit for a scraped together crew. Packed poorly resulting in damage, paid over $500 to load 1 26ft truck. Took 3 of them 3 hours to load.  Movers didn’t load all furniture instead filling 1/2 truck with random boxes.  Asked for discount due to their errors in scheduling and was given $50 off.  In contrast, a different company with 3 men unloaded the 26ft truck, 2 12ft trailers, and 2 pickups in under 3 hours including placing items and building beds. The cost for unloading was $400.  All my Sons really dropped the ball on my move.

name: Andrew Cain
text: 10 minutes prior to scheduled arrival they cancelled on me. I can not express enough the logistical bind this put me in. So incredibly disappointed in the way this was handled and how helpless this left me. I would not recommend using this company.

name: Tanisha Foster
text: I would NOT recommend this company!  A representative called me every day for a week until I pledged my business during our recent move.  A sales manager named Hannah apparently wanted to "sweeten the deal" and offered a sale rate they were running.  A call was made to us just 2 days before our move. Nate, the local store manager wanted to adjust our rates higher.  Furthermore, he was not professional in his interactions with me.  When I asked for a corporate phone number, I had to ask 3 times and he gave me a number that was not working.  I canceled a company just moments before to give this company our business.  I hope no one else has to deal with this hassle.

name: Ella Speed
text: Moved us in the rain. Made sure our furniture was wrapped and protected. Work efficiently even through difficult weather. I was impressed with the guys, Colin,  Andrew and Tommy.

name: Chocolate Kisses
text: I just recently used All My Sons on the June 18, 2020 to move my apartment. When I say they completely damaged my entire bedroom set and destroyed my carpet in my new home! I’ve reached out to management on several occasions to get the issue resolve! The sad part is that they offered me way less than a 1/4 of what I paid for my brand new furniture for all the damages! I definitely will not recommend to anyone!

resp.text:
Hello,                                    I would like the opportunity to speak with you about the experience that you had with us.

Corena Edens
Customer Relations Manager
All My Sons Business Development, LLC

name: Katie R
text: We had a great experience with All My Sons. They were punctual, friendly, quick, and professional. We were given a couple of calls before they arrived to confirm the appointment and again for a 20 min heads up before they arrived. We were given a two hour estimate, but the finished the job at least half an hour early. We will definitely be calling back next time we need to move.

name: Alicia Stallworth
text: As some one who just  had open heart surgery and wanted to make it as easy as possible this move was a nightmare the workers were standing around not doing anything a 2 hr move took 4 hrs they literally were standing around instead of moving stuff....my DVD stand was missing I asked about it and they said they didn't move it when I saw it being loaded  other things were missing and this move was $800 for  a crooked company and a bunch of thieves....don't use them look elsewhere...total crooks

name: Drew Holmes
text: They worked fast, efficient, and made sure that my money was well spent. They had great attitudes and were constantly smiling and joking with the family. Definitely will use again!!!

resp.text: Hi, Drew. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it!

name: Roy Kennedy
text: Showed up 4 hours late. Poor management ,manager got an attitude with me when I asked why they were late, movers  broke several glasses, scratched up furniture and our $3000 washer and dryer set. My wife and I were at our new house while they were packing the old one and once they were done we went to our old place to clean up and we noticed many items were left behind that we specifically asked them to load up on the truck. my wife goes to get her food out of the fridge and we realized one of the movers ate her food and used our condiments. I called the management, this dude didn't even apologize  and just asked if we wanted some gift cards to pay for the food the movers stole. Do not hire this company, I paid over $800 for terrible service. I'm not one to complain, really. But guys you have to get better management. If managed properly this would be a great company.

name: Jhavalen Brown
text:
I typically don’t leave reviews unless I am completely blown away or utterly dissatisfied. This company has been nothing more than a headache. My wife and I met a very professional man who guaranteed our furniture and home would be taken care of from the move. We were blown away and felt like this was the obvious choice from other companies. On move day they were hours late. To the point where we were rushing to get off the property before the new owners arrived. Only one of the 3 guys worked the whole time and the others were constantly on their phone sitting in the truck. As you can imagine this made the move out considerably longer. They damaged a wall in the staircase multiple times. It looks horrible. The new home owners were upset with what they were left with. My wife and I contacted the office and informed of the damage in which they made it seem like they would take care of it. Well it’s now 3 weeks later and they have just advised we need to provide them an estimate. Why was this not stated weeks ago. They have attempted to give us $180 to repair a desk, bed, and dresser, and wall. That is ridiculous. Now it’s to the point where I just want the wall fixed and that not enough to pay a handy man to drive out to provide an estimate and then have to go back for the repair. I could not be more disappointed and dissatisfied. You could do better to hire literally anyone else.

Ps. The driver/mover was the only positive thing about the move after it started. Luckily we got him as he did make sure to take care not to damage the new house.

name: Blaine Rosenberg
text: Thomas and his team did a great job! Quick and efficient and very personable

resp.text: Hi, Blaine. Your feedback is highly appreciated. Thank you for the review!

name: Jordan Merklein (Jordan M.)
text: Absolute TRASH! Our movers called us an hour before our move and told us they were at our storage unit and we needed to be there to let them in. I told them we signed up for 9:30 not 8:30 and we were in our closing and couldn’t be there for another hour. They then hung up on us and called back 3 more times while I was in my closing and couldn’t answer. My husband called them at 9 when our closing was finished and told them he’d be there in 30 minutes and they yelled at him and hung up. We called customer service to complain and they said they didn’t have anyone else to send out other than that crew and they were sorry. We ended up cancelling because why would we pay a company over $1000 and trust them with all of our belongings when they were so rude and yellowing/hanging up on us before the move even started?!?! Please, do not give this company your money!!

name: Bleanneh 10
text: Matt, Randy, and Antone is a hard working crew. They did a great job moving an entire house full of furniture in a timely manner. I would definitely recommend this crew to others.

name: Mary Dodd
text:
We cant say enough good things about our experience with the location in Pelham, Alabama. From my first conversation with Nate and the three (3) wonderful guys that moved us, it couldn't have gone smoother. I waited a few days to check my furniture before leaving a review and everything looks great. I highly recommend them. You will be very fortunate if you get this team; Joshua E., Quinton W., and Tommy H. All day is was yes sir, no sir, yes ma'am, no maam. They were so kind and courteous. Thanks guys for taking such good care of our furniture and belongings!

perience.

name: stan gillard

resp.text: Hi, Stan. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it!

name: Mandy Moore
text: My experience with All My Sons Moving & Storage was excellent. I had a few out of the ordinary requests and they met them for me. They're very professional, courteous, responsive, and I could not have chosen a better company for my move.

resp.text: Mandy We are so happy to hear that!

text: Sam, DJ, Gary, and Bryson were great, polite, and did a fantastic job!
